original: rdo rje snying po'i sgras /
analyzed: rdo rje snying po'i sgras /
translated: By the word vajra essence,

original: rdo rje mi phyed ces par brjod //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed ces par brjod //

original: ces pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'o //

original: de nyid kyi snying po ste gang @193a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi snying po ste gang @193a * //
translated: That very essence is the essence of that

original: gi khong dang nang de ni rdo rje snying po'o //
analyzed: gi khong dang nang de ni rdo rje snying po'o //
translated: which is the vajra essence.

original: de ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste /
analyzed: de ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste /
translated: That is the complete supreme enlightenment,üîΩthe wisdom of the complete supreme enlightenment from all perspectives.üîΩThis is the vajra essence complete supreme enlightenment.

original: mngon par thams cad nas yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ye shes so zhes pa rdo rje snying po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba zhes bya ba'i ming gi sgra 'dis gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mngon par thams cad nas yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ye shes so zhes pa rdo rje snying po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba zhes bya ba'i ming gi sgra 'dis gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: By this name, the word vajra essence is the vajra of speech.

original: brtag pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ste /
analyzed: brtag pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ste /
translated: Contemplation is right thought,

original: thugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: thugs rdo rje'o //

original: rgyal po ni gsal ba dang mdzes pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyal po ni gsal ba dang mdzes pa'i phyir te /

original: snang ba'i mtshan nyid sku rdo rje'o zhes pa rdo rje snying po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so zhes pa mnyam pa dbyer med pas bsdus pa'i phyir khyab cing yongs su thob pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba'i mtshan nyid sku rdo rje'o zhes pa rdo rje snying po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so zhes pa mnyam pa dbyer med pas bsdus pa'i phyir khyab cing yongs su thob pa'o //
translated: Since it is included in the indivisible equality, it is pervaded and completely obtained.

original: le'u bcu gcig bzhes pa /
analyzed: le'u bcu gcig bzhes pa /
translated: The eleventh chapter.

original: gcig rdo rje 'chang dang / aa bdag med ma ste /
analyzed: gcig rdo rje 'chang dang / aa bdag med ma ste /
translated: One is Vajradhara and the other is NairƒÅtmya.

original: gnyis ka dbyer med pa'o //üîΩbcu ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka dbyer med pa'o // bcu ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga'o //
translated: The two are indivisible.

original: de'i phat pas pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phat pas pa ste /
translated: The ten are the five sense organs and the five objects.üîΩThe pa of the pa·π≠ala is the pa of the pa of the pa·π≠ala.üîΩSince it takes and holds that, it is the eleventh chapter.üîΩThe king of tantras called the Vajra Essence Complete Enlightenment is complete in eleven chapters.

original: de len cing 'dzin pa'i phyir le'u bcu gcig pa'o zhes pa rdo rje snying po mngon par rdzogs par byad chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med paüîΩlas le'u bcu gcig pa'o /
analyzed: de len cing 'dzin pa'i phyir le'u bcu gcig pa'o zhes pa rdo rje snying po mngon par rdzogs par byad chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med paüîΩlas le'u bcu gcig pa'o /
translated: The eleventh chapter is from the commentary on Hevajra called the Stainless Light.

original: // /'dir de kho na'i rnal 'byor pa de kho na bzhi'i bdag nyid can lta stangs bzhi grub pa ye shes dud rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i nus pa grub pa na /
analyzed: // /'dir de kho na'i rnal 'byor pa de kho na bzhi'i bdag nyid can lta stangs bzhi grub pa ye shes dud rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i nus pa grub pa na /
translated: Here, the yoga of reality, the one who has the nature of the four realities, having accomplished the four gazes, the four powers of wisdom, consciousness, and so on,üîΩthen, from the body, and so on, the teaching of the dharma will arise.

original: de la khong pa la sogs pa rnams las kyang chos ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa rdo rje snying pos thugs la gnas par mdzad nas /
analyzed: de la khong pa la sogs pa rnams las kyang chos ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa rdo rje snying pos thugs la gnas par mdzad nas /
translated: Having thought that, Vajragarbha,

original: shing dang rngo dang 'jim pa la sogs pa'i sku gzugs rab tu gnas pa zhus pa'i sgo nas kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i sgo nas yang dag pa'i ye shes kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa nyid mngon par gsal bra bya ba'i
analyzed: shing dang rngo dang 'jim pa la sogs pa'i sku gzugs rab tu gnas pa zhus pa'i sgo nas kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i sgo nas yang dag pa'i ye shes kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa nyid mngon par gsal bra bya ba'i
translated: having requested the consecration of the images of wood, stone, clay, and so on, in order to clarify the indivisibility of the relative and the ultimate, the perfect wisdom, the indivisibility of the relative and the ultimate,

original: phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa /
analyzed: phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa /
translated: he supplicated the BhagavƒÅn:

original: rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po ni /
analyzed: rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po ni /
translated: The excellent characteristics of consecration,

original: ji ltar rigs pa bshad du gsol //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs pa bshad du gsol //
translated: please explain them as appropriate.üîΩThe BhagavƒÅn, Vajragarbha,

original: bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag / sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa'i sku //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag / sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa'i sku //
translated: the body of the singularity of all buddhas,

original: bcom ldan 'das rab gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad cing bstan du gsol //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rab gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad cing bstan du gsol //
translated: The Blessed One, please explain and teach the characteristics of consecration.

original: ji ltar rigs pa zhes pa rim pa ji lta ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs pa zhes pa rim pa ji lta ba'o //
translated: As it is proper means according to the sequence.

original: rab gnas mtshan nyid ces pa /
analyzed: rab gnas mtshan nyid ces pa /
translated: The characteristics of consecration.

original: gal te yang chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa myang na las 'das pa'i chos can yin pa de lta na 'ang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rtog pa @193b tha ma la pa'i nga rgyal rnam par bsal bas 'dus byas pa'i nga rgyal lhag par bsgrub pa'i
analyzed: gal te yang chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa myang na las 'das pa'i chos can yin pa de lta na 'ang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rtog pa @193b tha ma la pa'i nga rgyal rnam par bsal bas 'dus byas pa'i nga rgyal lhag par bsgrub pa'i
translated: Even though all phenomena are non-abiding and characterized by transcending suffering, in order to eliminate the pride of conceptualizing relative truth, and in order to establish the pride of the conditioned,

original: phyir rab tu gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rigs so zhes pa ste /
analyzed: phyir rab tu gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rigs so zhes pa ste /
translated: it is proper to explain the characteristics of consecration.

original: rab tu gnas pa'i mtshan nyid bshad du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa'i mtshan nyid bshad du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa'o //
translated: Thus, he requested the Blessed One to explain the characteristics of consecration.

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid ni khyad par gnyis kyis rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid ni khyad par gnyis kyis rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: The Blessed One is to be understood through two distinctions:

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: he is the embodiment of the two truths.

original: rdo rje snying po bdag ces pa rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po bdag ces pa rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'o //
translated: The vajra essence of self means vajra is indivisible.

original: de nyid ni snying po gtso bo ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni snying po gtso bo ste /
translated: That itself is the essence, the principal one.

original: dbang gi sku yin pa ni bdag nyid do //
analyzed: dbang gi sku yin pa ni bdag nyid do //
translated: The body of the Lord is the empowered body.

original: 'dis bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: This verse declares the inseparability of wisdom and means in the Lord.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: And for that very reason,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa'i sku //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa'i sku //
translated: the body of all the Buddhas is one.

original: de rnams thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyang yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad de /
analyzed: de rnams thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyang yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad de /
translated: Because they are all Buddhas, they are all the Buddhas.

original: me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: They are the nature of the five wisdoms, mirror-like wisdom, etc., and the three bodies.

original: de rnams gcig pa ni dbyer med pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams gcig pa ni dbyer med pa ste /
translated: They are one, because they are inseparable.

original: de gang gi lus yin pa ni sku'o //
analyzed: de gang gi lus yin pa ni sku'o //
translated: The body of that is the body of all the Buddhas.

original: yang na sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa dbyer med pa ste /
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa dbyer med pa ste /
translated: Or else, the body of all the Buddhas is one, because they are inseparable.

original: des gang gi gzung ba chags pa'i mtshan nyid bral bar gyur pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: des gang gi gzung ba chags pa'i mtshan nyid bral bar gyur pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa'i sku'o //
translated: The body of that is the body of all the Buddhas, because it is free from the characteristic of attachment to the grasped.

original: shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa'i sku nyi kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pa'i sku nyi kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid de /
translated: By the inseparability of wisdom and means, he is the embodiment of ultimate truth, and by the single body of all buddhas, he is the embodiment of conventional truth.

original: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid mchog tu gyur pa kho na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid mchog tu gyur pa kho na zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, the Blessed One is the embodiment of the two truths, and is supreme.üîΩHaving performed the burnt offering,

original: spyin sreg byas te dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: spyin sreg byas te dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: one should erect the ma·πá·∏çala

original: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhengs byas nas //üîΩsrod la lhag gnas la sogs pa //
analyzed: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhengs byas nas // srod la lhag gnas la sogs pa //
translated: as it is taught,

original: byas te sku gzugs sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: byas te sku gzugs sbyang bar bya //
translated: and purify the image in the evening.

original: nyi ma gung la bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i don du sbyin sreg byas te /
analyzed: nyi ma gung la bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i don du sbyin sreg byas te /
translated: At noon, one should perform the burnt offering for the sake of pacifying obstacles.üîΩHaving erected the ma·πá·∏çala according to the prescribed ritual,

original: dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho gas bzhengs byas nas srod la nyin mo 'das pa'i dus na /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho gas bzhengs byas nas srod la nyin mo 'das pa'i dus na /
translated: in the evening, at the time when the day has passed,

original: lhag gnas la sogs pa zhes sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs pa dgod pa dang / mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa dang me tog dang lhag gnas la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa ni lhag gnas la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lhag gnas la sogs pa zhes sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs pa dgod pa dang / mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa dang me tog dang lhag gnas la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa ni lhag gnas la sogs pa'o //
translated: The preparatory rites, etc. are the arrangement of the mantras and gestures, etc., and the worship with the offerings of water for the feet, water for the mouth, and so on, and with flowers, etc.

original: de byas te sku gzugs sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: de byas te sku gzugs sbyang bar bya //
translated: Having done that, one should consecrate the image.

original: rim pa 'dis sku gzugs sbyang bar bya'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rim pa 'dis sku gzugs sbyang bar bya'o zhes pa ste /
translated: By this procedure, one should consecrate the image.

original: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
analyzed: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
translated: All the Buddhas dwelling in the skyüîΩshould be caused to enter the heart of the image,

original: nges par sku gzugs snying gar gzhug / rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal @194a * //
analyzed: nges par sku gzugs snying gar gzhug / rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal @194a * //
translated: and the yogi, equal to his chosen deity,

original: 'byor pa // rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son //
analyzed: 'byor pa // rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son //
translated: having seen well, should perfect the mantra.

original: snga gro lha rnams rab tu gnas pa bya ste //
analyzed: snga gro lha rnams rab tu gnas pa bya ste //
translated: In the morning, one should perform the consecration of the deities.

original: lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u ra ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drang ba de lta bu'i rig pas spyan drangs te /
analyzed: lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u ra ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drang ba de lta bu'i rig pas spyan drangs te /

original: yang dag par mchod nas /
analyzed: yang dag par mchod nas /

original: de rnams sku gzugs kyi snying gar rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams sku gzugs kyi snying gar rab tu gzhug par bya'o //

original: de yang slob dpon khyad par ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de yang slob dpon khyad par ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the special quality of the master?

original: rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ who is equal to the desired deity.

original: 'dis ci gsungs na gang gi 'dod pa'i lha shes rab dang thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs pa'i rim pa gang yin pa de mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ci gsungs na gang gi 'dod pa'i lha shes rab dang thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs pa'i rim pa gang yin pa de mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //

original: rab mthong zhes pa cho ga shes pa ste /
analyzed: rab mthong zhes pa cho ga shes pa ste /

analyzed: de'i snying gar rab tu gzhug cing dbab par bya'o //
translated: It is to be inserted, to be placed, in its heart.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /

analyzed: sangs rgyas me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga dang / sku gsum dang shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes rnams so //

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /

original: nam mkhar bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkhar bzhugs pa ste /

analyzed: nges pa ni 'dir the tshom med pa nyid do zhes pa'i don no ;
translated: Certainty here means the very absence of doubt.

original: / rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: / rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa //

analyzed: rang sems te des btsal bar 'gyur pa'i lha me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga po de rnams ni 'dod lha'o //

original: yang na zhabs bsil ni ye shes te /
analyzed: yang na zhabs bsil ni ye shes te /

analyzed: de nyid dang po gtso bor gyur pa'o //

original: mchod yon ni rin che zhing rnyed par dka' ba ste /
analyzed: mchod yon ni rin che zhing rnyed par dka' ba ste /

original: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa'o //

original: de ni sngar bzhin te /
analyzed: de ni sngar bzhin te /

original: gong ma'i rgyud kyi cho ga rim pas /
analyzed: gong ma'i rgyud kyi cho ga rim pas /
translated: The sequence of rites from the former tantra is

analyzed: khyad par rtogs pa'i cho ga rnyed pa rnams kyis te /

analyzed: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnams kyis zhes pa'i don no //
translated: which have the nature of the five gnoses.

original: spyin sreg gi don du thab khung gsungs pa /
analyzed: spyin sreg gi don du thab khung gsungs pa /

original: zhi bar thab khung zlum po ste //
analyzed: zhi bar thab khung zlum po ste //

original: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi pa //
analyzed: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi pa //

original: gsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod //
analyzed: gsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod //

original: 'di nyid la ni lhag ma sgrub //
analyzed: 'di nyid la ni lhag ma sgrub //

original: 'di nyid la zhes pa gru gsum nyid de /
analyzed: 'di nyid la zhes pa gru gsum nyid de /

original: lhag ma zhes pa mngon spyod la sogs pa rnams rdzogs par bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes pa mngon spyod la sogs pa rnams rdzogs par bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The rest means that the rest, such as killing, should be accomplished.

original: yang na / zlum po zhes pa mnyam pa nyid las so //üîΩgru bzhi zhes pa de nyid ye shes bzhi'i bdag @195a * //
analyzed: yang na / zlum po zhes pa mnyam pa nyid las so // gru bzhi zhes pa de nyid ye shes bzhi'i bdag @195a * //
translated: Or else, round means from sameness.

original: nyid can no //
analyzed: nyid can no //
translated: Square means that it is the nature of the four pristine consciousnesses.

original: gru gsum zhes pa rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gru gsum zhes pa rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Triangular means the nature of the three vajras.

original: lhag ma zhes pa lhag ma med pa'i ye shes lnga la sogs pa rnams sgrub cing yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes pa lhag ma med pa'i ye shes lnga la sogs pa rnams sgrub cing yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The rest means that the rest, such as the five pristine consciousnesses without remainder, should be accomplished and perfectly attained.

original: thab khung gi tshad gsungs pa /
analyzed: thab khung gi tshad gsungs pa /
translated: The measure of the hearth is stated:

original: khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid //
analyzed: khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid //

original: zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin //
analyzed: zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin //

original: zhi ba'i thab khung gi tshad ni steng du khru gang dang 'og tu mtho gang zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'i thab khung gi tshad ni steng du khru gang dang 'og tu mtho gang zhes pa'o //
translated: The size of the pacifying hearth is one cubit on top and one handspan below.

original: khru do dang ni khru gang yang //
analyzed: khru do dang ni khru gang yang //
translated: Two cubits and one cubit

original: rgyas pa'i steng dang 'og tu brjod //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i steng dang 'og tu brjod //

original: 'di ni rgyas pa'i thab khung gi tshad do //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyas pa'i thab khung gi tshad do //
translated: This is the size of the enriching hearth.

original: sor mo nyid shu de'i phyed kyang //
analyzed: sor mo nyid shu de'i phyed kyang //
translated: Twenty finger-widths and half of that

original: gsad pa'i steng dang 'og tu 'dod //
analyzed: gsad pa'i steng dang 'og tu 'dod //
translated: are said to be for the pacifying and the enriching hearths, respectively.

original: 'di ni gsad pa'i thab khung gi tshad do //
analyzed: 'di ni gsad pa'i thab khung gi tshad do //
translated: This is the size of the pacifying hearth.

original: thab khung gi kha dog gsungs pa //
analyzed: thab khung gi kha dog gsungs pa //
translated: The colors of the hearths are stated:

original: zhi la kha dog dkar por 'gyur //
analyzed: zhi la kha dog dkar por 'gyur //

original: rgyas pa la ni kha dog ser //
analyzed: rgyas pa la ni kha dog ser //

original: gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag / dbang la dmar por rab tu grags //
analyzed: gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag / dbang la dmar por rab tu grags //

original: ji ltar dbang la de ltar dgug / gsad la ji ltar dbye ba sogs //
analyzed: ji ltar dbang la de ltar dgug / gsad la ji ltar dbye ba sogs //

analyzed: gsad pa la thab khung bru gsum pa bya zhing de yang kha dog nag po'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du dbye ba dang bskrad pa la sogs pa rnams la yang thab khung gi kha dog bya'o //

original: dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmar po nyid ces pa'o //
analyzed: dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmar po nyid ces pa'o //
translated: For the rites of subjugation and attraction, one should use red flowers.

analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa'i don du sreg blugs kyi rdzas gsungs pa /

original: zhi la til dang rgyas la zho //
analyzed: zhi la til dang rgyas la zho //

original: de bzhin gsad la tsher ma can //
analyzed: de bzhin gsad la tsher ma can //

original: dbye ba sogs la tsher ma ra brjod //
analyzed: dbye ba sogs la tsher ma ra brjod //
translated: For the rites of dissension, etc., one should use thorn apple.

original: dbang dang dgug la autpala //
analyzed: dbang dang dgug la autpala //
translated: For subjugation and attraction, one should use utpala flowers.

original: don go sla ba nyid do //
analyzed: don go sla ba nyid do //
translated: The meaning is easy to understand.

original: yang na zhi ba'i zhes pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i ye shes te /
analyzed: yang na zhi ba'i zhes pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i ye shes te /
translated: Alternatively, pacification is the wisdom of great nirvana,

analyzed: gang du 'og dang steng du zhes pa srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med pas so //

original: de yang khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: de yang khyad par ci zhe na /

analyzed: khru gcig ces pa lnga'i bdag nyid can gnyis te /

analyzed: khru phyed ces pa lag pa'i phyed ni khru phyed de /

analyzed: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can spro ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir 'di ni bdag med ma dang rdo rje 'chang gnyis dbyer med pa kho na zhes pa'o //
translated: Since it is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses, it is the indivisibility of NairƒÅtmya and Vajradhara.

original: khru do zhes pa shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gnyis ka ye shes lnga nyid do //üîΩde nyid khru gcig ste /
analyzed: khru do zhes pa shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gnyis ka ye shes lnga nyid do // de nyid khru gcig ste /
translated: ‚Äú Two cubits‚Äù is the nature of wisdom and method, the five pristine consciousnesses.üîΩ‚Äú One cubit‚Äù is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can gnyis po de nyid gcig gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can gnyis po de nyid gcig gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú One‚Äù is the nonduality of those two.

original: steng dang 'og tu zhes gsungs pa'i don nyid do //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu zhes gsungs pa'i don nyid do //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúabove and below‚Äù is just that.

original: rgyas pa zhes pa rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa stong pa @195b nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: rgyas pa zhes pa rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa stong pa @195b nyid kyi ye shes so //

original: gzhan ma yin no zhes pa'i don no //

original: sdud pas gnas pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sdud pas gnas pa zhes pa'o //

original: de ni sor mo nyi shu ste /

analyzed: dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang / shes pa lnga'i rang bzhin nyid kyis sor mo nyi shu rdo rje 'chang gi ye she so //
translated: By the nature of the five sense faculties, the five objects, and the five consciousnesses, the twenty fingers are the gnosis of Vajradhara.

analyzed: de'i phyed ces pa shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin lnga pa gnyis so //

translated: Increase is the gnosis endowed with all supreme aspects,

original: ser po sdud pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ser po sdud pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: which is the yellow color, the nature of gathering.

original: zhi la til dang rgyas la zho //
analyzed: zhi la til dang rgyas la zho //

original: gsad pa dang dbye ba dang bskrad pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis drag po'i dngos po tsher ma can kho nar gsungs so //
analyzed: gsad pa dang dbye ba dang bskrad pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis drag po'i dngos po tsher ma can kho nar gsungs so //

original: dbang dang dgug pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gnas pa'i ye shes las me tog dri bzang po nyid de autpala zhes pa'o //

original: gang du bsreg par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang du bsreg par bya ba gsungs pa /

original: aom aagna ye mtha'a te dz'a: sa rba k'arma pra s'a dh'a ka: k'a ru ni kri tva sarba aanra aasma ni sanni hi to bha ba zhes pa me dgug pa ste /

original: ba'i rang bzhin no //

original: 'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub pa //

original: me spyan drangs te /

analyzed: dngos po gang der phul ba'i dngos po de dang de nyid de'i bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir bsreg bya za ba'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi don dang gzhan don nyid bsgrubs pa ni de'i bdag nyid kyis bdag nying la dngos po thams cad longs spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //

translated: Therefore, having accomplished one's own aim and the aim of others, one's own nature is established in the nature of the enjoyment of all things.

analyzed: gshegs zhes pa don rtogs pas rnam par gnas shing mkhyen par mkhyen par mdzod ces pa'o //

original: de nyid ji ltar zhe na /

analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /

translated: The ya is VƒÅyu, the ra is RƒÅhu, and the la is Speech Vajra.

original: tha snang ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje 'chang ngo //üîΩaa bdag med ma thugs rdo rje ste /üîΩji ltar zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: tha snang ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje 'chang ngo // aa bdag med ma thugs rdo rje ste / ji ltar zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o //
translated: The tha is Appearance, the na is the characteristic, and the da is Vajradhara.üîΩ The a is NairƒÅtmya, the va is Mind Vajra, and the ya is the indivisibility of the three vajras.

original: 'di nyid zhe na /üîΩdus na ste /üîΩka k'a li /
analyzed: 'di nyid zhe na / dus na ste / ka k'a li /

original: aa a'a li zhes pa ka'o //
analyzed: aa a'a li zhes pa ka'o //

original: gnyis ka len cing 'dzin pa'i phyir k'a li shes rab dang thams dbyer med pa'o //

original: gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid de //
analyzed: gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid de //

original: gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'i don no //

original: mchod yon gyi sngags gsungs pa /

analyzed: aom mkha' spyod ma byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin nyid do //

analyzed: ram zhes pa bdag med pa dang dbyer med pa'i mkha' spyod ma @197a * //
translated: Ram is Khecarƒ´, inseparable from NairƒÅtmya.

original: nyid de / sngags yi ge bdun no //

original: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa de rnams kyi rgyu yis zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa de rnams kyi rgyu yis zhes pa'i don te /

analyzed: 'jigs pa dang mya ngan ni gti mug chen po rnam par dag pa'o //

original: gdung ba dang smyo ba ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gdung ba dang smyo ba ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: sdug bsngal dang 'tshe ba ni zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: gdung ba dang smyo ba dang 'dod chags ni 'od dpag med rnam par dag pa'o //

analyzed: sdug bsngal dang tshe ba dang zhe sdang ni mi bskyod pa rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes pa nyon mongs pa yongs su spong pa'o //

analyzed: bag chags yongs su spong ba gsungs pa /

original: phan dang mi phan 'bras 'byung ba //
analyzed: phan dang mi phan 'bras 'byung ba //

original: de ltar nges pa rnam dpyad pas //
analyzed: de ltar nges pa rnam dpyad pas //

original: ji ltar skad cig gcig kyang de //
analyzed: ji ltar skad cig gcig kyang de //

original: rnal 'byor pa rnam ca cor gnas /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnam ca cor gnas /

original: de lta bu'i rim pas mi phan pa nyid phan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rim pas mi phan pa nyid phan par 'gyur te /

analyzed: de nyid phan pa dang mi phan pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'o //

analyzed: de lta bu'i rim pas nges par rnam par dpyad na /

analyzed: 'on kyang de ltar rnam par dpyad pa dang @200b ldan pa rnams kyi ca cor cung zad kyang med pa nyid do zhes ba ste /

analyzed: thams cad dge ba kho na yin kyi mi dge ba ni cung zad kyang med do zhes pa'o //

original: yang na / ae wam zhes pa thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i ye shes te gcig gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: yang na / ae wam zhes pa thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i ye shes te gcig gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: Or else, ‚Äúevam‚Äù is the gnosis of the indivisibility of method and wisdom, which is one and not two.

original: phan dang mi phan 'bras 'byung ba /
analyzed: phan dang mi phan 'bras 'byung ba /

original: phan pa stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid las bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: phan pa stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid las bdag med ma'o //

analyzed: mi phan pa mi stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid las rdo rje 'chang ste /

analyzed: 'bras bu gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid 'byung ngo zhes pa'o //

analyzed: ae wam gyi rang bzhin nyid las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bag chags med pa nyid do zhes dgongs pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ye shes kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, the greatness of wisdom is stated:üîΩ‚ÄúEven one who has committed the five acts of immediate retribution,

analyzed: gang zhig rtog pas kyang sems can la gnod pa byed pa'o //

analyzed: de ltar yang zhi ba'i lhas gsungs pa ;

analyzed: 'phel ba'i rang bzhin nyid 'grib pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //

original: gzhan yang de 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de 'ba' zhig ma yin te /

analyzed: skye ba dman pa gang dang gang //

analyzed: zhes pa chos thams cad de //

analyzed: skye ba dman zhes pa dang po nas ma skyes pa'o //

analyzed: yang dag nyid la yang dag blta //

original: ku'i sgras chos 'byung ste /

analyzed: de ni nges par gdon mi za bar 'grub @201b par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: re zhig ces pa de yongs su gyur pa'i ngo bo dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi rang bzhin yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid ces pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /

analyzed: zla ba gcig tu gsang la spyad //

analyzed: gcig gnyis su med pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsang ba nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa ste /

analyzed: ji srid bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa gnyis ka'i n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis po de gang la yod pa de ni ji srid do //

analyzed: de'i phyag rgya zhes pa phyag rgya chen po rnyed par 'gyur te /

analyzed: gang gang zhig gsungs pa /

analyzed: byed ba bzang po yongs spangs pa //

original: kye rdo rje 'dzin pas sems can don srid pa gsum gcig pa don dam pa'i rang bzhin bsgrub par gyis shig / phyag rgya bdag med ma khyer la che ge mo zhes pa 'di dang de zhes pa la sogs pa de bstan par mi nus pa nyid kyis
analyzed: kye rdo rje 'dzin pas sems can don srid pa gsum gcig pa don dam pa'i rang bzhin bsgrub par gyis shig / phyag rgya bdag med ma khyer la che ge mo zhes pa 'di dang de zhes pa la sogs pa de bstan par mi nus pa nyid kyis
translated: Take the seal NairƒÅtmya, and for such-and-such a person, and for such-and-such a person, and so on, it is not possible to demonstrate that.‚Äù

original: so // sngags pa yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa gzhan pa'i bka' rnyed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: so // sngags pa yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa gzhan pa'i bka' rnyed par 'gyur te /
translated: The mantra practitioner who has attained the true knowledge will obtain the permission of others.

original: rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams kyis gnang bar 'gyur zhing gnang ba ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams kyis gnang bar 'gyur zhing gnang ba ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The yoginis such as Nairatmya will give permission and grant permission.

original: 'dis ji srid rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams gnang ba ma byung ba de srid phyag rgya'i dngos grub mi 'byung ngo zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ji srid rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams gnang ba ma byung ba de srid phyag rgya'i dngos grub mi 'byung ngo zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The idea is that as long as the permission of the Vajrayoginis does not occur, the attainment of the seal will not occur.

original: rnyed pa de yang mig yangs ma //
analyzed: rnyed pa de yang mig yangs ma //
translated: That attainment is one with wide eyes,

original: gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa ste //
translated: adorned with form and youth,

original: sa h'i ga bur yang dag ldan //
analyzed: sa h'i ga bur yang dag ldan //
translated: perfectly endowed with camphor,

original: byang chub sems kyis sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyis sbyang bar bya //
translated: and purified by the thought of awakening.

original: phyag rgya chen po rnyed cing thob nas byang chub sems yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyang zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po rnyed cing thob nas byang chub sems yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyang zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Having attained the great seal, one should purify and accomplish the thought of awakening, the true knowledge.

original: mig yangs ma /
analyzed: mig yangs ma /
translated: One with wide eyes.

original: gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa ste //
translated: Adorned with form and youth.

original: zhes pa de'i yang dag pa'i ye shes lhag @202a * //
analyzed: zhes pa de'i yang dag pa'i ye shes lhag @202a * //
translated: The true knowledge of that is superior.

original: par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu bstan to //
translated: the characteristic of the state of being a buddha is taught.

original: yang zhes pa gang gi phyir te /
analyzed: yang zhes pa gang gi phyir te /
translated: Again, because of what?

original: gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa de nyid kyi phyir byang chub kyi sems rgyas pa yin zhing /
analyzed: gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa de nyid kyi phyir byang chub kyi sems rgyas pa yin zhing /
translated: Because of that very adornment with form and youth, the bodhicitta expands.

original: si hla ga bur yang dag ldan //
analyzed: si hla ga bur yang dag ldan //
translated: Possessing true camphor and saffron.

original: zhes pa'o // yang na bdag med ma de sbyang zhing yang dag pa'i rim pas nges par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // yang na bdag med ma de sbyang zhing yang dag pa'i rim pas nges par bya'o //
translated: Or else, that NairƒÅtmya should be purified and ascertained by the true stage.

original: gang gis shen /
analyzed: gang gis shen /
translated: By what?

original: byang chub kyi sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis so //
translated: By the bodhicitta, the nonconceptual gnosis.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: sihla ga pur yang dag ldan //
analyzed: sihla ga pur yang dag ldan //
translated: Possessing true camphor and saffron.

original: sihla nyi ma dang / ga pur zla ba ste /
analyzed: sihla nyi ma dang / ga pur zla ba ste /
translated: Camphor is the sun and saffron is the moon.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis yang dag par ldan pa ni kha sbyor gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis yang dag par ldan pa ni kha sbyor gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The union of the sun and moon is the nature of union.üîΩAgain, because of what?

original: yang zhes pa gang gi phyir te mig yangs ma yangs pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi mig ni gang zhig bden pa gnyis so //
analyzed: yang zhes pa gang gi phyir te mig yangs ma yangs pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi mig ni gang zhig bden pa gnyis so //
translated: The wide-eyed one is the eye of the nature of exalted wisdom, which is the two truths.

original: de rnyed pa ni thob cing shis pa'o //
analyzed: de rnyed pa ni thob cing shis pa'o //
translated: The attainment of that is the auspiciousness of the attainment.

original: gzugs kyi sgras snang bsku rdo rje ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi sgras snang bsku rdo rje ste /
translated: The word form is the vajra of the body,

original: yang rlung gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: yang rlung gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: and the vital wind is the vajra of speech.

original: aom sa spyod ma bdag med ma thugs rdo rje ste gsum po 'di ni gzugs dang lang tsho byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: aom sa spyod ma bdag med ma thugs rdo rje ste gsum po 'di ni gzugs dang lang tsho byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The Om is the goddess Nairatmya, the vajra of mind. These three are form, youth, and bodhicitta.

original: des gang la brgyan cing mdzes pa de gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: des gang la brgyan cing mdzes pa de gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa ste /
translated: That which is adorned by them, and is beautiful, is adorned with form and youth.

original: 'dis rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: 'dis rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
translated: This means the nature of the exalted wisdom of the indivisibility of the three vajras.

original: dge ba bcu las brtsams nas ni //
analyzed: dge ba bcu las brtsams nas ni //
translated: Having begun with the ten virtues,

original: de la chos ni rab gsal bya //
analyzed: de la chos ni rab gsal bya //
translated: one should illuminate the Dharma

original: lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni //
analyzed: lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni //
translated: in the form of a deity,

original: dam tshig gcig pa'i sems nyid do //
analyzed: dam tshig gcig pa'i sems nyid do //
translated: with the mind of the same commitment.

original: de la chos /
analyzed: de la chos /
translated: There, the Dharma

original: dang po gso sbyong sbyin par bya //
analyzed: dang po gso sbyong sbyin par bya //
translated: is first the giving of the purification and vow.

original: de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu'o //üîΩzhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu'o // zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: After that, the ten precepts.

original: rab gsal bya srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba bcu las ldog pa ni dge ba bcu'i chos so //
analyzed: rab gsal bya srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba bcu las ldog pa ni dge ba bcu'i chos so //
translated: The ten virtues are the opposite of the ten nonvirtues, such as killing.

original: de las brtsams pa de sngon du song ba las brtsams pa'i chos de la rab tu gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de las brtsams pa de sngon du song ba las brtsams pa'i chos de la rab tu gsal bar bya'o //
translated: Having begun with that, one should illuminate that Dharma which is begun.

original: lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni //
analyzed: lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni //
translated: The mind of the form of the deity

original: zhes pa lha'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa lha'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: is the purity of the deity.

original: dam tshig ces pa bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa ste de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ces pa bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa ste de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The pledge is the five nectars and so forth, which is the purity of suchness.

original: gcig pa'i sems nyid ces pa rim pa gnyis rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gcig pa'i sems nyid ces pa rim pa gnyis rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The single mind is the nondual pristine awareness, the purity of the two stages.

original: yang na de la zhes pa bdag med ma la /
analyzed: yang na de la zhes pa bdag med ma la /
translated: Alternatively, ‚Äúin that‚Äù refers to NairƒÅtmya.

original: chos ni chos kyi sku ste 'od gsal ba nyid kyis rab gsal bya /
analyzed: chos ni chos kyi sku ste 'od gsal ba nyid kyis rab gsal bya /
translated: The Dharma is the dharmakƒÅya, which should be illuminated by the light of clear light.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis rnam par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis rnam par gnas par bya'o //
translated: One should abide in the nature of that.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: bcu zhes pa lnga'i bdag nyid can phyag gnyis te /
analyzed: bcu zhes pa lnga'i bdag nyid can phyag gnyis te /
translated: The ‚Äúten‚Äù are the two hands, which have the nature of the five.

original: dge ba ni chos 'byung dang dbye ba med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dge ba ni chos 'byung dang dbye ba med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The virtue is the pristine awareness that is inseparable from the dharma source.

original: ku bdag med ma dang / sha le rdo rje 'chang ste @202b gnyis ka lnga'i bdag nyid can bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes las brtsams pa ni de nas brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: ku bdag med ma dang / sha le rdo rje 'chang ste @202b gnyis ka lnga'i bdag nyid can bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes las brtsams pa ni de nas brtsams pa'o //
translated: The I is NairƒÅtmya, and the flesh is Vajradhara. The two are the nature of the five, and the wisdom of Vajradhara inseparable from NairƒÅtmya is begun, which is then begun.

original: lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni //
analyzed: lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni //
translated: The mind in the form of the deity

original: zhes pa spro ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes pa spro ba'i ye shes so //
translated: is the wisdom of emanation.

original: dam tshig ces pa sdud pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dam tshig ces pa sdud pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The pledge is the wisdom of gathering.

original: gcig pa'i sems nyid ces pa spro ba dang sdud pa'i bdag nyid can gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kho na'o //
analyzed: gcig pa'i sems nyid ces pa spro ba dang sdud pa'i bdag nyid can gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kho na'o //
translated: The single mind is the nondual wisdom that is the nature of both emanation and gathering.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩzla ba gcig gis de skal ldan //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / zla ba gcig gis de skal ldan //
translated: For that very reason,üîΩin one month, there is no doubt

original: 'dir 'gyur the tshom med pa nyid //
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur the tshom med pa nyid //
translated: that the fortunate one will become

original: gang phyir mchog thob bud med ni //üîΩkun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: gang phyir mchog thob bud med ni // kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
translated: the mudra.

original: zla ba gcig gis phyag rgya de skal ldan shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur bar the tshom med pa nyid de /
analyzed: zla ba gcig gis phyag rgya de skal ldan shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can du 'gyur bar the tshom med pa nyid de /
translated: In one month, there is no doubt that the fortunate one will become the mudra, which is the nature of the wisdom of the completely pure dharmadhƒÅtu.

original: gang gi phyir gang las mchog thob gnang ba rnyed pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang las mchog thob gnang ba rnyed pa ste /
translated: Because of which, he is the one who has obtained the supreme, the attainment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, he is the one who has abandoned all conceptual thoughts, the one who is of the nature of non-conceptuality.

original: yang na / de skal ldan shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: yang na / de skal ldan shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Or else, he is the one who is endowed with good fortune, the one who is extremely pure, the one who is of the nature of the dharmadhatu.

original: de ni zla bar 'gyur te ma byang chub kyi sems dang / aa bdag med ma ni ma zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zla bar 'gyur te ma byang chub kyi sems dang / aa bdag med ma ni ma zhes pa'o //
translated: He is the moon, the bodhicitta, and the mother, the Nairatmya.

original: gnyis ka za ba'i phyir zla ba ma ning ngo //
analyzed: gnyis ka za ba'i phyir zla ba ma ning ngo //
translated: Because he devours both, he is the neuter moon.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: gcig gis gnyis su med par rtogs pas so //
analyzed: gcig gis gnyis su med par rtogs pas so //
translated: Because of the realization of non-duality by the one.

original: 'dir the tshom med de 'di la dogs pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dir the tshom med de 'di la dogs pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: Here, there is no doubt, there is no hesitation whatsoever.

original: mchog rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: mchog rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The supreme is Vajradhara.

original: des thob pa'i bud med ni bdag med ma ste gang gi phyir n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis las so //
analyzed: des thob pa'i bud med ni bdag med ma ste gang gi phyir n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis las so //
translated: The woman who is obtained by him is Nairatmya, because of the two garlands of nada.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
translated: he is the one who has abandoned all conceptual thoughts.

original: kun du rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: kun du rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning is that all conceptual thoughts are completely abandoned.

original: yang na bdag gi nus pa yis //
analyzed: yang na bdag gi nus pa yis //
translated: Or, by my power,üîΩhaving summoned the seal, one should examineüîΩthe gods, demigods, humans,

original: phyag rgya bkug la rab tu brtag / lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // gnod sbyin mi'am ci las kyang ;
analyzed: phyag rgya bkug la rab tu brtag / lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // gnod sbyin mi'am ci las kyang ;
translated: and kinnaras.

original: / don go sla ba nyid do //
analyzed: / don go sla ba nyid do //
translated: The meaning is easy to understand.

original: yang na bdag rdo rje 'chang gi mthu dang nus pa yis phyag rgya chen po rab tu brtag / phul du byung ba'i ye shes dang ldan par rnam par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na bdag rdo rje 'chang gi mthu dang nus pa yis phyag rgya chen po rab tu brtag / phul du byung ba'i ye shes dang ldan par rnam par gnas par bya'o //
translated: Or, by the power and ability of myself, Vajradhara, one should examine the great seal, abiding in the state of supreme wisdom.

original: yang na zhes pa gnyis ka dbyer med pa rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: yang na zhes pa gnyis ka dbyer med pa rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin te /
translated: Or, the two ‚Äúor‚Äù [meanings] are the nature of Vajradhara, the indivisibility of the two.

original: lha dang lha min mi rnams las bkug nas lha dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: lha dang lha min mi rnams las bkug nas lha dbang po rnams so //
translated: Having summoned the gods, demigods, and humans, the gods are the lords.

original: lha ma yin yul rnams so //
analyzed: lha ma yin yul rnams so //
translated: The demigods are the objects.

original: mi rnam par shes pa ste mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga po rnams la bkug nas zhes pa bsdus nas so //
analyzed: mi rnam par shes pa ste mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga po rnams la bkug nas zhes pa bsdus nas so //
translated: Having summoned the humans, the consciousnesses, the fifteen dakinis, having gathered them,

original: gnod sbyin rnams las zhes pa cha dang bral ba'i rang bzhin las so //
analyzed: gnod sbyin rnams las zhes pa cha dang bral ba'i rang bzhin las so //
translated: and the yakshas, from the nature free of parts,

original: mi'am ci las kyang khyad par gyi don la kyang gi sgra ste /üîΩmi'am ci @203a * //
analyzed: mi'am ci las kyang khyad par gyi don la kyang gi sgra ste / mi'am ci @203a * //
translated: The word also in the special sense from the kinnara.

original: las zhes pa ci'i sgras ma ning ngo //
analyzed: las zhes pa ci'i sgras ma ning ngo //
translated: The word kinnara is neuter.

original: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi mi las te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi mi las te /
translated: From the human of that nature, human is neuter.

original: ma ning gi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang gi rgyu las so //
analyzed: ma ning gi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang gi rgyu las so //
translated: From the cause of Vajradhara, the nature of the neuter.

original: de yang khyer la spyod pa spyad //
analyzed: de yang khyer la spyod pa spyad //
translated: Also, take that and practice.

original: bdag gi brtan pa rtogs pa las //
analyzed: bdag gi brtan pa rtogs pa las //
translated: From the realization of my stability.

original: phyag rgya de bzung nas spyod pa bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de bzung nas spyod pa bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Having taken that seal, practice should be accomplished.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: bdag gi brtan pa rtogs pa las rang gi brtan pa rtogs pa na spyod pa bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi brtan pa rtogs pa las rang gi brtan pa rtogs pa na spyod pa bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: When the realization of my stability is realized, practice should be done, is the intention.

original: yang na / spyod pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pas gnas pa spyad cing shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na / spyod pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pas gnas pa spyad cing shes par bya'o //
translated: Or, Practice should be done and known by abiding in the practice of the indivisibility of the relative and the ultimate.

original: phyag rgya de khyer la goms par bya zhing bdag rdo rje 'chang gi brtan par gnas pa rtogs pa'i ye shes de las zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: phyag rgya de khyer la goms par bya zhing bdag rdo rje 'chang gi brtan par gnas pa rtogs pa'i ye shes de las zhes pa'i don no //
translated: Take that seal and practice.  From the wisdom of the realization of my stability, the stability of Vajradhara, is the meaning.

original: gang zhig phyag rgya blangs nas spyod pa byed pa de ni longs spyod las ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang zhig phyag rgya blangs nas spyod pa byed pa de ni longs spyod las ma yin gyi /
translated: He who takes up the seal and practices, does not do so for the sake of enjoyment.

original: 'on kyang grol ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang grol ba'i don du'o //
translated: But rather for the sake of liberation.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyi //
analyzed: gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyi //
translated: The practice explained, which has a frightening form,

original: spyod pa longs spyod phyir ma gsungs //
analyzed: spyod pa longs spyod phyir ma gsungs //
translated: was not taught for the sake of enjoyment.

original: yid ni brtan nam g-yo'am ci //
analyzed: yid ni brtan nam g-yo'am ci //
translated: Whether the mind is firm or wavering,

original: rang sems so sor brtag phyir ro //
analyzed: rang sems so sor brtag phyir ro //
translated: it is for the sake of examining one's own mind.

original: gang zhig 'jig rten chos brgyad las rnam par grol ba'i spyod pa ni shin tu 'jigs pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig 'jig rten chos brgyad las rnam par grol ba'i spyod pa ni shin tu 'jigs pa ste /
translated: The practice that is completely frightening, which is liberated from the eight worldly dharmas,

original: de ni longs spyod 'dod pas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni longs spyod 'dod pas ma yin gyi /
translated: is not for the sake of desiring enjoyment.

original: 'on kyang grol ba'i don kho nar zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang grol ba'i don kho nar zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: But rather for the sake of liberation alone, that is the intention.

original: yang na spyod pa gang bshad pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te /
analyzed: yang na spyod pa gang bshad pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te /
translated: Or else, the practice that is explained, which has a frightening form,

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can bya ba de ni brjod du med pa brjod pa'i yul ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can bya ba de ni brjod du med pa brjod pa'i yul ma yin pa ste /
translated: that activity, which has the nature of the two truths, is inexpressible, not an object of expression,

original: ngag gi lam las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngag gi lam las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it transcends the path of speech.

original: de ni longs spyod phyir ma gsungs //
analyzed: de ni longs spyod phyir ma gsungs //
translated: It was not taught for the sake of enjoyment.

original: sgro ma btags par yang dag par grub pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: sgro ma btags par yang dag par grub pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning is that it is truly established without superimposition.üîΩNow, having taken the seal for the sake of the accomplishment of the seal, one should practice.

original: da ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi don du phyag rgya blangs nas spyod pa bya'o zhes pa 'di la rdo rje snying po rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi don du phyag rgya blangs nas spyod pa bya'o zhes pa 'di la rdo rje snying po rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
translated: Here, Vajra Essence, due to conceptualization, asks:

original: bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
analyzed: bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
translated: How is it that one endowed with the yoga of NairƒÅtmya

original: phyag rgya'i khyad par de ji ltar //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i khyad par de ji ltar //
translated: has a special seal?

original: bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa nyid las rnal 'byor ba nyid phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa nyid las rnal 'byor ba nyid phyag rgya ste /
translated: Due to being endowed with the yoga of NairƒÅtmya itself, one is a yogin.

original: 'di'i phyag rgya'i khyad par gzhan gyis ci //
analyzed: 'di'i phyag rgya'i khyad par gzhan gyis ci //
translated: What is the difference in this seal from another?

original: zhes rnam par rtog pa ste 'di yang phyag rgya yin la de bzhin du gzhan de la yang ngo //
analyzed: zhes rnam par rtog pa ste 'di yang phyag rgya yin la de bzhin du gzhan de la yang ngo //
translated: This is conceptualization. This is also a seal, and so is another.

original: phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis dag las //
analyzed: phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis dag las //
translated: From the two seals,

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: how does the accomplishment of the seal occur?

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'i ye shes yin la /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'i ye shes yin la /
translated: The accomplishment of the great seal is the gnosis of the inseparability of wisdom and method.

original: 'dir yang / bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni bdag med ma'i ngo bo nyid las @203b bud med kyi rang bzhin yin zhing 'di'i gzhan phyag rgya yang phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid las te /
analyzed: 'dir yang / bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni bdag med ma'i ngo bo nyid las @203b bud med kyi rang bzhin yin zhing 'di'i gzhan phyag rgya yang phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid las te /
translated: Here also, the man endowed with the yoga of NairƒÅtmya is of the nature of NairƒÅtmya, and his consort is of the nature of the consort.

original: ji ltar gnyis su me pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gnyis su me pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: How can the attainment of nonduality arise?

original: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: To this the Blessed One replied:

original: bud med gzugs ni spangs nas gzhan //
analyzed: bud med gzugs ni spangs nas gzhan //
translated: Abandoning the form of a woman,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya //
translated: one should make the form of the Blessed One.

original: bud med kyi gzugs yongs su spangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya'o //
analyzed: bud med kyi gzugs yongs su spangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya'o //
translated: Abandoning the form of a woman, one should make the form of the Blessed One.

original: 'di ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is this done?

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: nu ma spangs nas bollar 'gyur //
analyzed: nu ma spangs nas bollar 'gyur //
translated: Abandoning the breasts, one should make the testicles,

original: kakko la dbus yang dag gnas //
analyzed: kakko la dbus yang dag gnas //
translated: perfectly situated in the middle of the kakkola.

original: 'gram pa gnyis ni dril bur 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gram pa gnyis ni dril bur 'gyur //
translated: The two cheeks become the bells,

original: ze'u 'bru bolla can 'gyur te //
analyzed: ze'u 'bru bolla can 'gyur te //
translated: and the anthers become the testicles.

original: lhag ma bdag nyid chen po'i gzugs //
analyzed: lhag ma bdag nyid chen po'i gzugs //
translated: The rest is the form of the Great Being,

original: he ru ka yi dga' chen no //
analyzed: he ru ka yi dga' chen no //
translated: the great bliss of Heruka.

original: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste //
analyzed: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste //
translated: The man born of the union of Heruka

original: 'bad pa med par skyes bur 'gyur //
analyzed: 'bad pa med par skyes bur 'gyur //
translated: becomes a man without effort.

original: nu ma snying gar bolla rdo rjer 'gyur zhing bolla'i nang du gnas pa kakko la padmo'i //
analyzed: nu ma snying gar bolla rdo rjer 'gyur zhing bolla'i nang du gnas pa kakko la padmo'i //
translated: The breasts are the vajra at the heart, and the inner part of the breasts is the lotus of the kakkola.

original: 'dis ci gsungs na bud med kyi nu ma dag snying gar ro //
analyzed: 'dis ci gsungs na bud med kyi nu ma dag snying gar ro //
translated: What is he saying? The breasts of a woman are at the heart.

original: de'i nang du yang rdo rje dang padma gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du yang rdo rje dang padma gnas pa'o //
translated: And in their inner part are the vajra and lotus.

original: rdo rje dang padmo 'di dag kha sbyor nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padmo 'di dag kha sbyor nyid do //
translated: These vajra and lotus are in union.

original: skyes pa'i ni /
analyzed: skyes pa'i ni /
translated: In the case of a man,

original: sa bon gnyis kyi nu ma gnyis //
analyzed: sa bon gnyis kyi nu ma gnyis //
translated: the two breasts are the two seed syllables.

original: zhes pa ste nu ma spangs nas bollar 'gyur /
analyzed: zhes pa ste nu ma spangs nas bollar 'gyur /
translated: Having abandoned the breasts, they become the testicles.

original: de'i dbus su yang kakko la ste padma dang rdo rje dag dbyer med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dbus su yang kakko la ste padma dang rdo rje dag dbyer med pa nyid do //
translated: And in their middle is the kakkola, which is the indivisibility of the lotus and the vajra.

original: bud med kyi mtshan ma ni padma'o //
analyzed: bud med kyi mtshan ma ni padma'o //
translated: The sign of a woman is the lotus.

original: skyes pa'i rdo rje ste rdo rje dang padma dag las gnyis ka yang la sbyor ro //
analyzed: skyes pa'i rdo rje ste rdo rje dang padma dag las gnyis ka yang la sbyor ro //
translated: The vajra of a man is the vajra and lotus.

original: de'i phyir bud med dang skyes pa dag la khyad par 'ga' yang med do zhes pa dbyer med pa ste sa bon gyi dbye ba dang / phyi rol gyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bud med dang skyes pa dag la khyad par 'ga' yang med do zhes pa dbyer med pa ste sa bon gyi dbye ba dang / phyi rol gyi dbye ba'o //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference at all between women and men.

original: yang sa bon gnyis snying gar gnas par gyur pa ni nu ma gnyis so //
analyzed: yang sa bon gnyis snying gar gnas par gyur pa ni nu ma gnyis so //
translated: The two seeds located in the heart are the two breasts.

original: steng du rdo rje dang 'og tu padma zhes pa bud med kyi gnyis so //
analyzed: steng du rdo rje dang 'og tu padma zhes pa bud med kyi gnyis so //
translated: The vajra is above and the lotus is below, for women.

original: sa bon gnyis po de nyid 'og tu rdo rje dang steng du padma zhes pa gnyis so zhes pa nu ma spangs nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon gnyis po de nyid 'og tu rdo rje dang steng du padma zhes pa gnyis so zhes pa nu ma spangs nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Those two seeds are the vajra below and the lotus above, for men.

original: 'gram pa gnyis ni dril bur 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gram pa gnyis ni dril bur 'gyur //
translated: The two cheeks become the bell.

original: zhes pa a'a li k'a li n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis ni dril bu ste de ni padma dang ze'u 'bru'o //
analyzed: zhes pa a'a li k'a li n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis ni dril bu ste de ni padma dang ze'u 'bru'o //
translated: The two garlands of vowels and consonants are the bell, which is the lotus and the anthers.

original: bolla can 'gyur zhes pa n'a de'i phreng ba gnyis /üîΩrtsa ba ze'u 'bru rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bolla can 'gyur zhes pa n'a de'i phreng ba gnyis / rtsa ba ze'u 'bru rdo rje'o //
translated: The two garlands of nƒÅdas are the two cheeks.

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: The root is the anther, the vajra.

original: gnyis ka rdo rje dang padma dbyer med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis ka rdo rje dang padma dbyer med pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, the vajra and lotus are inseparable.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: lhag ma'i gzugs zhes pa gang zhig gnyis ka dbyer med pa de he ru ka rdo rje 'chang gi'o //
analyzed: lhag ma'i gzugs zhes pa gang zhig gnyis ka dbyer med pa de he ru ka rdo rje 'chang gi'o //
translated: The ‚Äúremaining form‚Äù is that which is inseparable from both, that of Heruka-Vajradhara.

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: dga' chen te gang gi dga' ba chen po bdag med ma ste de'i 'o zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: dga' chen te gang gi dga' ba chen po bdag med ma ste de'i 'o zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The ‚Äúgreat joy‚Äù is that of NairƒÅtmya, whose great joy is that of him.üîΩThis is the meaning of the phrase.

original: de nyid kyi phyir he ru ka sbyor ba gnyis @204a * //üîΩsu med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir he ru ka sbyor ba gnyis @204a * // su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i 'o //
translated: For that very reason, Heruka is endowed with the gnosis of the nondual union.

original: phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i bdag med ma bsgoms pas kyang 'di gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid de /
analyzed: phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i bdag med ma bsgoms pas kyang 'di gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid de /
translated: By meditating on NairƒÅtmya endowed with the seal, there is the gnosis of the nonduality of these two.

original: 'bad pa med par rtsol ba med pa nyid kyis skyes bu skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bad pa med par rtsol ba med pa nyid kyis skyes bu skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: By being effortless, without exertion, one becomes a person of the nature of the arisen.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pa ;
analyzed: gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pa ;
translated: the yogi/nƒ´ who is capable of clarity

original: / gang phyir phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: / gang phyir phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: will attain the power of the seal.

original: gang phyir zhes pa de'i phyir te rnal 'byor pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gang phyir zhes pa de'i phyir te rnal 'byor pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor that reason‚Äù means for that reason, the yogi/nƒ´ is endowed with the gnosis of nonduality.

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub phyag rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub phyag rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: The power of the seal is the Great Seal.

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: gsal bar nus pa'i de gsal ba yang yin zhing nus pa yang yin pa'i phyir gsal bar nus pa ste /
analyzed: gsal bar nus pa'i de gsal ba yang yin zhing nus pa yang yin pa'i phyir gsal bar nus pa ste /
translated: It is the power of clarity, because it is both clear and powerful.

original: gang la yod pa de ni gsal bar nus pa'o //
analyzed: gang la yod pa de ni gsal bar nus pa'o //
translated: That which has it is the power of clarity.

original: de'i phyag rgya gsal ba dang ldan pa zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya gsal ba dang ldan pa zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning is that it has the seal of clarity.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: skye dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang //
analyzed: skye dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang //
translated: birth and death

original: shes rab thabs la gnod mi 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab thabs la gnod mi 'gyur //
translated: do not harm wisdom and means.

original: shes rab ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: Wisdom is the seal.

original: thabs ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: thabs ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: Means is the yogin.

original: gnyis ka la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te gang gis she na /
analyzed: gnyis ka la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te gang gis she na /
translated: Both are not harmed. By what?

original: skye dang 'jig pa dag gis skye ba dang 'gag pa dag gis te /
analyzed: skye dang 'jig pa dag gis skye ba dang 'gag pa dag gis te /
translated: By birth and death, by arising and ceasing.

original: skye ba dang 'chi bas gnod par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'chi bas gnod par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning is that they are not harmed by birth and death.

original: yang na skye ba dngos po ste 'jig pa dngos med do //
analyzed: yang na skye ba dngos po ste 'jig pa dngos med do //
translated: Or else, birth is an entity, and death is a non-entity.

original: de dag gis shes rab dang thabs dngos po dang dngos med kyi bdag nyid can kho na ste /
analyzed: de dag gis shes rab dang thabs dngos po dang dngos med kyi bdag nyid can kho na ste /
translated: They are only wisdom and method, the nature of existence and non-existence.

original: gang gi phyir rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes yin pa de'i phyir gnod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes yin pa de'i phyir gnod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Because it is the wisdom of Vajradhara, therefore there is no harm,

original: rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do //
translated: and there is not even the slightest conceptualization.

original: bde nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: bde nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because of bliss itself.

original: gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba ste //
translated: Because the method is origination,

original: 'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed //
analyzed: 'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed //
translated: and destruction is wisdom, the end of existence.

original: thabs ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
analyzed: thabs ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
translated: The method is Vajradhara.

original: 'byung ba ni yang dag pa'i ngo bor 'byung ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni yang dag pa'i ngo bor 'byung ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Origination is the arising of the true nature, the nature of conventional truth.

original: 'jig pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: Destruction is nirvana.

original: shes rab ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is ultimate truth.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can kho na rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can kho na rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: Vajradhara is only the nature of the two truths.

original: srid mthar byed ces pa srid pa skye ba dang mthar 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: srid mthar byed ces pa srid pa skye ba dang mthar 'jig pa ste /
translated: The end of existence is the end of birth and destruction.

original: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can gyi kam ye shes 'di la yod pa'i phyir srid mthar byed ces pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can gyi kam ye shes 'di la yod pa'i phyir srid mthar byed ces pa'o //
translated: Since this wisdom, which has the nature of arising and ceasing, exists in this [vajra holder], he is the terminator of existence.

original: yang na kam srid pa 'khor ba mthar byed pa'i phyir srid mthar byed shes rab ste /
analyzed: yang na kam srid pa 'khor ba mthar byed pa'i phyir srid mthar byed shes rab ste /
translated: Or else, since this wisdom terminates existence, the cycle of birth and death, it is the terminator of existence.

original: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med pa bdag med ma nyid ces dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med pa bdag med ma nyid ces dgongs pa'o //
translated: Since existence and nirvana are inseparable, it is the very state of Nairatmya. This is the intended meaning.

original: des na 'di la rab 'jig med //
analyzed: des na 'di la rab 'jig med //
translated: Therefore, there is no destruction in this [vajra holder].

original: de nyid las ni skye ba med //
analyzed: de nyid las ni skye ba med //
translated: And since there is no arising from itself,

original: la la 'jig pas zad 'gyur te //
analyzed: la la 'jig pas zad 'gyur te //
translated: there is no exhaustion due to destruction.

original: @204b 'jig pa med phyir zad pa'ang med /
analyzed: @204b 'jig pa med phyir zad pa'ang med /
translated: And since there is no destruction, there is no exhaustion.

original: rgyu des na rdo rje 'chang nyid la 'jig pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa med do //
analyzed: rgyu des na rdo rje 'chang nyid la 'jig pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa med do //
translated: For this reason, there is no destruction or nirvana in Vajradhara himself.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: de nyid las ni skye ba med rang gi ngo bo las te /
analyzed: de nyid las ni skye ba med rang gi ngo bo las te /
translated: there is no arising from itself, from its own nature,

original: chos thams cad gdod mnas ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad gdod mnas ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: since all phenomena are primordially unborn. This is the intended meaning.

original: gang zhig skye ba'i chos can de ni nges par 'jig par 'gyur gyi gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i phyir 'jig pa med cing zad pa'ang med do //
analyzed: gang zhig skye ba'i chos can de ni nges par 'jig par 'gyur gyi gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i phyir 'jig pa med cing zad pa'ang med do //
translated: That which has the nature of arising is certainly subject to destruction. But because of non-arising from the beginning, there is no destruction, no cessation.

original: 'ong zhes pa gang gi phyir te /
analyzed: 'ong zhes pa gang gi phyir te /
translated: Where is there coming?

original: gang zhig la la zad par 'gyur ba de ni nges par 'jig pa las so //
analyzed: gang zhig la la zad par 'gyur ba de ni nges par 'jig pa las so //
translated: That which is subject to cessation is certainly subject to destruction.

original: de med pa'i phyir skye ba dang 'jig pa dag med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir skye ba dang 'jig pa dag med pa nyid do //
translated: Because of the non-existence of that, there is no arising and no destruction.

original: de'i phyir gnod pa rnam pa thams cad du med pa kho na'o zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa'i don no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnod pa rnam pa thams cad du med pa kho na'o zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa'i don no //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in any way. This is the meaning of the explanation of the two verses.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: the yogi/nƒ´ of the stage of generation,

original: spros pa bsgom bya brtul zhugs can //
analyzed: spros pa bsgom bya brtul zhugs can //
translated: endowed with the discipline of meditation on elaboration,

original: spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas //
analyzed: spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas //
translated: having made elaboration like a dream,

original: spros pa rnams kyis spros med byed //
analyzed: spros pa rnams kyis spros med byed //
translated: makes the unelaborated through elaborations.

original: bskyad pa zhes pa skye ba ste //
analyzed: bskyad pa zhes pa skye ba ste //
translated: Generation is birth.

original: lha'i rnam pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i rnam pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: It is the purification of the form of the deity.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni des thob pa ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni des thob pa ste /
translated: The stage of generation is that by which one attains.

original: rnal 'byor ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: Yoga is the gathering.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor des dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms pas spros pa gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa bsgom zhing snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor des dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms pas spros pa gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa bsgom zhing snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
translated: By that yoga of the stage of generation, one should meditate on the mandala circle and enter into meditative equipoise on the proliferation of the form aggregate, and so on.

original: brtul zhugs can zhes pa rnam par dag pa gnyis nges pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can zhes pa rnam par dag pa gnyis nges pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The one who is disciplined is the one who is of the nature of the ascertainment of the two purities.

original: spros pa lha'i rnal 'byor gyis rmi lam ltar byas nas /
analyzed: spros pa lha'i rnal 'byor gyis rmi lam ltar byas nas /
translated: Having made the proliferation of the deity yoga like a dream,

original: gang zhig spros pa lha'i rnam pa rnams kyis spros med bya /
analyzed: gang zhig spros pa lha'i rnam pa rnams kyis spros med bya /
translated: one should make the nonproliferation of the deity aspect.

original: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa dbyer med par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa dbyer med par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should realize the inseparability of the form aggregate, and so on.

original: 'dis ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams lha'i rnam pas rnam par sbyang zhing goms par byed pa mngon du gyur pa na /
analyzed: 'dis ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams lha'i rnam pas rnam par sbyang zhing goms par byed pa mngon du gyur pa na /
translated: This is the actual purification and familiarization with the form aggregate, and so on, by means of the deity aspect.

original: chu dang 'o ma bzhin tha dad pa yang tha dad med par skad cig la skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: chu dang 'o ma bzhin tha dad pa yang tha dad med par skad cig la skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Just like water and milk, the different becomes undifferentiated and arises in an instant.

original: yang na bskyed pa'i sgras yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: yang na bskyed pa'i sgras yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Or, the word ‚Äúcreation‚Äù refers to correct pristine consciousness.

original: de'i rim pa ni thob pa ste /

analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa las gnyis su med pa rtogs pas spros pa spro ba ste /

analyzed: spro ba dang sdud pa'i rang bzhin 'di nyid ye shes so zhes pa'i don no //

analyzed: 'di ji lta bu zhe na //
translated: What is this like?üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir @205a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir @205a * //

analyzed: gsungs pa / ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang // ji ltar srid pa bar ma bzhin //

analyzed: rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba las //üîΩde bzhin dkyil 'khor snang bar 'gyur //

analyzed: bar chad med par goms pas sbyor ba gnyis su med par rtogs pa las dkyil 'khor lha'i rnam par bsgom pa so sor snang bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma zhes pa mngon sum nyid la bden pa ma yin brdzun pa ma yin no //

analyzed: ji ltar rmi lam zhes pa mngon sum ma yin pa la bden pa ma yin brdzun pa ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du sgyu ma snang ba sku rdo rje'o //

original: rmi lam mtshan ma gsung rdo rje'o //

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /

analyzed: rtag tu bar chad med pa tha dad med pa'o //

analyzed: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa dag gnyis su med pa nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /

analyzed: 'di ni de yi mthu nyid de //

analyzed: gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med /

analyzed: gzhan las 'byung ba med gzhan las skyes ba ma yin no //

analyzed: 'di ni de'i mthu nyid de //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar //

translated: Yellow, red, white, green, and blue are the natures of Ratnasa·πÉbha- va, AmitƒÅbha, Vairocana, Amoghasiddhi, and Vajrasattva, respectively.

original: ces pa thugs la gnas par mdzad nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /

translated: Having reflected on this, Vajragarbha asked:
