translated: Therefore, the pervaded, the pervader, and the nature are the pervaded body, the pervader pleasure,

original: de lta bu'i rang bzhin bde ba dang ye shes kyis 'gro ba khams gsum pa khyab ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin bde ba dang ye shes kyis 'gro ba khams gsum pa khyab ba'o //
translated: and the nature of that sort, pleasure and intuition, pervades the three realms of the world.

original: yang na lus dngos med ni zhes pa /
analyzed: yang na lus dngos med ni zhes pa /
translated: Or else, if the body is unreal,

original: aa'i rang bzhin gyis dngos po ni dngos med de /
analyzed: aa'i rang bzhin gyis dngos po ni dngos med de /
translated: the thing of the nature of A is unreal.

original: bdag med ma'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: bdag med ma'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: It is Vajradhara by nature of Nairatmya.

original: de yang lus te 'phel @206b ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de yang lus te 'phel @206b ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: And that is the body, which is characterized by increase.

original: 'di lus dang dngos med kyang yin pa'i phyir lus dngos med de /
analyzed: 'di lus dang dngos med kyang yin pa'i phyir lus dngos med de /
translated: Since it is both body and unreal, it is the body unreal.

original: de ltar gyur pa na 'phel ba'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin bdag med ma nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa na 'phel ba'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin bdag med ma nyid kyis so //
translated: When it is so, by Nairatmya itself, which is of the nature of Vajradhara, characterized by increase.

original: gang las chos 'byung las te bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gang las chos 'byung las te bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: It arises from the Dharma, which is the gnosis of simultaneously born bliss.

original: bde ba de yang smra bar mi nus te ngag gi lam las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: bde ba de yang smra bar mi nus te ngag gi lam las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: That bliss is inexpressible because it is beyond the range of speech.

original: khyab bya khyab byed rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: khyab bya khyab byed rang bzhin gyis //
translated: The pervasion is by nature the pervasion of the object of pervasion.

original: zhes ba khyab bya khyab byed kyi bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyis 'gro ba khyab ste yang dag pa'i ye shes 'gro ba dang dbyer med pa nyid do zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: zhes ba khyab bya khyab byed kyi bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyis 'gro ba khyab ste yang dag pa'i ye shes 'gro ba dang dbyer med pa nyid do zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of this is that the object of pervasion, the gnosis of simultaneously born bliss, pervades all beings because the true gnosis is inseparable from beings.

original: 'di nyid dpes brtan par byed pa //
analyzed: 'di nyid dpes brtan par byed pa //
translated: This is confirmed by the example.

original: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
analyzed: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
translated: The fragrance that resides in the flower

original: me tog dngos med las mi rtogs //
analyzed: me tog dngos med las mi rtogs //
translated: is not perceived from the absence of the flower.

original: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas //
analyzed: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas //
translated: In the same way, the absence of form and so on

original: bde ba dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur //
translated: does not perceive the bliss.

original: me tog la gnas pa'i dri rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur te /
analyzed: me tog la gnas pa'i dri rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur te /
translated: The fragrance that resides in the flower is perceived and understood.

original: me tog gi dngos po med pa las ma yin pa ji lta bde bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi dngos po med pas bde ba dmigs par 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: me tog gi dngos po med pa las ma yin pa ji lta bde bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi dngos po med pas bde ba dmigs par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: Just as the non-existence of a flower is not a basis for the perception of pleasure, so too the non-existence of form, etc. is not a basis for the perception of pleasure.

original: de'i phyir gzugs la mi gnas pa ni gzugs kyi dngos po med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs la mi gnas pa ni gzugs kyi dngos po med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the non-abiding in form is the non-existence of form.

original: 'dra ba ni cung zad khyad par gnas ba yin gyi de thams cad mtshungs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba ni cung zad khyad par gnas ba yin gyi de thams cad mtshungs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Similarity is a slight difference, but not that they are all the same.

original: 'on kyang de'i bdag nyid kyis rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i bdag nyid kyis rtogs par bya ste /
translated: However, it should be understood by its nature.

original: gzugs nyid gzugs med pa dang gzugs med pa nyid gzugs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs nyid gzugs med pa dang gzugs med pa nyid gzugs so zhes pa'o //
translated: Form itself is formless, and formlessness itself is form.üîΩOr,

original: yang na / ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
analyzed: yang na / ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
translated: the fragrance that resides in a flower

original: zhes pa / dri shes pa de ni re zhig me tog la gnas pa rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa / dri shes pa de ni re zhig me tog la gnas pa rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
translated: is understood and comprehended as residing in a flower.

original: me tog nyid gdod ma nas ma skyes ba nyid kyis dngos med las skye ba bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: me tog nyid gdod ma nas ma skyes ba nyid kyis dngos med las skye ba bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: Since a flower itself is primordially unborn, the arising from non-existence is refuted.

original: dri dang dri'i shes pa mi rtogs shing khong du chud par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dri dang dri'i shes pa mi rtogs shing khong du chud par mi 'gyur te /
translated: One does not realize or comprehend smell and the consciousness of smell,

original: gang zhig dri'i shes pa rtogs pa'i shes pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang zhig dri'i shes pa rtogs pa'i shes pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other consciousness that realizes the consciousness of smell.

original: de bzhin du bde ba yang dag pa'i ye shes dmigs pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bde ba yang dag pa'i ye shes dmigs pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Likewise, the bliss of the perfect wisdom does not become an object,

original: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
translated: because it is of the nature of non-apprehension.

original: ji ltar zhe na /üîΩgzugs la sogs pa dngos med bas //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / gzugs la sogs pa dngos med bas //
translated: How is that?üîΩForm and so on are non-entities.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa ni aa'i rang bzhin gyis dngos po ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa ni aa'i rang bzhin gyis dngos po ste /
translated: The non-entity of form and so on is the entity of the nature of A.

original: des na gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin bdag med ma nyid kyis zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: des na gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin bdag med ma nyid kyis zhes pa'i don no //
translated: Therefore, the nature of form and so on is just Nairatmya.

original: 'dis ci gsungs na /
analyzed: 'dis ci gsungs na /
translated: What does this say?

original: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste //
analyzed: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste //
translated: There is no complete meditation.

original: zhes pa'i phyogs 'di @207a * //
analyzed: zhes pa'i phyogs 'di @207a * //
translated: This position

original: grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: grub pa nyid do //
translated: is established.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa rtogs pa las //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa rtogs pa las //
translated: From the realization of the creation stage,

original: zhes dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes dgongs pa ste /
translated: this is the intention.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam par spangs nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam par spangs nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: Without the generation stage, there is no completion stage.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
analyzed: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
translated: There is nothing to be removed from this,

original: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
analyzed: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
translated: and not the slightest to be added.

original: yang dag nyid la yang dag blta //üîΩyang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
analyzed: yang dag nyid la yang dag blta // yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
translated: The real is to be seen as real;

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: when it is seen as real, one is liberated.

original: 'di ni bden pa mthong ba gang zhig chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bden pa mthong ba gang zhig chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'o //
translated: This is the seeing of the truth, the realization of the nature of all things.

original: dri ma glo bur ba dang ldan pa rnams la rtag tu ma rig pa'i dbang gis dngos po'i de kho na rtogs pa med do //üîΩdngos po de kho na rtogs pa'i yang ma rig pa rnam par bsal nas dngos po de kho na rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: dri ma glo bur ba dang ldan pa rnams la rtag tu ma rig pa'i dbang gis dngos po'i de kho na rtogs pa med do // dngos po de kho na rtogs pa'i yang ma rig pa rnam par bsal nas dngos po de kho na rtogs pa med do //
translated: Those who possess adventitious stains, because of ignorance, do not realize the reality of things.üîΩAnd when ignorance is removed, they do not realize the reality of things.

original: gnyis ka la yang dngos po de kho na rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: gnyis ka la yang dngos po de kho na rtogs pa med do //
translated: And when neither is the case, they do not realize the reality of things.

original: dngos po'i de kho na rtogs pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po'i de kho na rtogs pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid do //
translated: The realization of the reality of things is the very thing itself.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de ltar gyur pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni bdag gis mi shes te skyon cir ji ltar zhes pa'o ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de ltar gyur pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni bdag gis mi shes te skyon cir ji ltar zhes pa'o ;
translated: Therefore, the nature of those is not known by the self, as to what and how.

original: / de'i phyir rtag tu ma rig pas gnas pa rnams kyi dri ma glo bur bsal ba'i don du lha'i rnam pa'i rnam par dag pa'i dngos po zhes pa bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: / de'i phyir rtag tu ma rig pas gnas pa rnams kyi dri ma glo bur bsal ba'i don du lha'i rnam pa'i rnam par dag pa'i dngos po zhes pa bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: Therefore, for the sake of removing the adventitious stains of those who always abide in ignorance, the deity‚Äôs aspect is the pure entity, the creation stage.

original: de nyid skad cig la mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon du gyur pa'i phyir 'di dang de'o zhes pa rnam par bcad par mi nus pa nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid skad cig la mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon du gyur pa'i phyir 'di dang de'o zhes pa rnam par bcad par mi nus pa nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since that is actualized by the equality of the instant, it is not possible to distinguish this and that, and thus the perfection stage is attained.

original: lha'i rnam par dag pa dang de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de /
analyzed: lha'i rnam par dag pa dang de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the deity and the purity of suchness are nondual.

original: gnyis su byar med pa tha dad cing gcad du med pa'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med pa tha dad cing gcad du med pa'o zhes pa ste /
translated: They are not dual, not different, and not divisible.

original: bskyed pa yis ni dgos pa ci //
analyzed: bskyed pa yis ni dgos pa ci //
translated: What is the purpose of creation?

original: zhes gang zhig rdo rje snying po'i zhu ba 'di ni de rnam pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen spangs pa nyams pa'i chos can lta bu ste /
analyzed: zhes gang zhig rdo rje snying po'i zhu ba 'di ni de rnam pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen spangs pa nyams pa'i chos can lta bu ste /
translated: This is the petition of the vajra essence, which is completely virtuous, like a spiritual friend, for one who has abandoned the spiritual friend, who is a person of degenerate Dharma.

original: ae ma dad pa'i shugs kyis nyams //
analyzed: ae ma dad pa'i shugs kyis nyams //
translated: Alas, one is ruined by the force of faith.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di //
translated: This is the great bodhisattva

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs la 'khrungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs la 'khrungs pa'o //
translated: which arose in the BhagavƒÅn's mind.

original: gzhan yang / bdag nyid nye bar bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dgos pa chen po gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang / bdag nyid nye bar bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dgos pa chen po gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, in order to demonstrate himself, the BhagavƒÅn states the great purpose of the creation stage:

original: dngos nga dngos po med par //
analyzed: dngos nga dngos po med par //
translated: I am both an entity and a non-entity,

original: dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas pa //
translated: because I am realized as an entity.

original: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam pa'i gzugs nyid kyis nga nyid re zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos po ste dngos po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam pa'i gzugs nyid kyis nga nyid re zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos po ste dngos po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: I myself, by the form of having faces and arms, am for the time being an entity, the nature of an entity.

original: dngos po med pa nga nyid de //
analyzed: dngos po med pa nga nyid de //
translated: I am a non-entity.

original: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam @207b pa'i gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam @207b pa'i gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the form of having faces and arms is formless by nature.

original: sangs rgyas nga nyid de rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nga nyid de rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas so //
translated: I am the Buddha, because of possessing the realization of that.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: dngos po rtogs pa nyid las sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dngos po rtogs pa nyid las sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes brjod do //
translated: From the realization of the thing itself, all the Buddhas are said to be omniscient.

original: de'i phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa rtogs pa kho nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa nges pa'o zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa rtogs pa kho nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa nges pa'o zhes pa'i don no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is that by the realization of the creation stage alone, the perfection stage is ascertained.

original: yang na / nga aa yig dang / ham yig gi ngo bo nyid ni dngos po ste /
analyzed: yang na / nga aa yig dang / ham yig gi ngo bo nyid ni dngos po ste /
translated: Or else, the thing is the nature of the letter A and the letter Ham,

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of being the nature of wisdom and means.üîΩI am the non-thing, because of being the nature of the letter A.

original: de nyid dngos po med par nga nyid de /üîΩgnyis ka tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid dngos po med par nga nyid de / gnyis ka tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'o //
translated: I am the Buddha, because of being the nature of the letter Ham.üîΩI am the Buddha, because of being the nature of the letter A and the letter Ham.

analyzed: nga nyid sangs rgyas te shes rab dang thabs dbyer med par shes pa'o ;üîΩ/ ji ltar zhe na dngos po rtogs phyir gang zhig gnyis ka dbyer med pa ma yin pa'i dngos po de med de /

original: dngos po thams cad shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin kho na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin kho na zhes pa'o //
translated: All things are of the nature of wisdom and means.

original: rgyu de'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir /
translated: For this reason,üîΩThose who are struck down by laziness,

original: gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang // rmongs pa gang zhig nga mi shes //
analyzed: gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang // rmongs pa gang zhig nga mi shes //
translated: And those who are ignorant of me out of delusion,

original: dam pa nga spyod bde ba can ;
analyzed: dam pa nga spyod bde ba can ;
translated: The holy ones who practice me are happy,

original: / rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la //
analyzed: / rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la //
translated: In the bhaga of the Vajra Queen.

original: rmongs pa gang zhig gti mug gis bsgribs pa de rnams kyis nga mi shes te /
analyzed: rmongs pa gang zhig gti mug gis bsgribs pa de rnams kyis nga mi shes te /
translated: Those who are obscured by the delusion of ignorance do not know me.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ni re zhig rmongs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ni re zhig rmongs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: The purity of thusness is indeed not the domain of the ignorant.

original: shes rab rnon po nyid kyis ni gal de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta na yang /
analyzed: shes rab rnon po nyid kyis ni gal de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta na yang /
translated: Even if those with sharp wisdom were to realize the purity of thusness,

original: dngos po'i de kho na nges par rtogs pa nyid de /
analyzed: dngos po'i de kho na nges par rtogs pa nyid de /
translated: It would be just the ascertainment of the reality of things.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa las gzhan pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa med pa kho na'o zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa las gzhan pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa med pa kho na'o zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be said that there is no completion stage other than the generation stage.

original: gang zhig le los bsnun pa zhes pa le lo ni sgyid lug pa yin zhing /
analyzed: gang zhig le los bsnun pa zhes pa le lo ni sgyid lug pa yin zhing /
translated: He who is struck by laziness means that laziness is despondency.

original: bsnun pa ni bcom pa ste lha'i rnam par sprul pa bsgom pas ci zhes brtson 'grus dman pa lha'i rnam par dag pa mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: bsnun pa ni bcom pa ste lha'i rnam par sprul pa bsgom pas ci zhes brtson 'grus dman pa lha'i rnam par dag pa mi shes pa'o //
translated: Striking means destroyed, and by meditating on the emanation of the deity, one does not know the purity of the deity, with inferior effort.

original: de rnams kyis kyang nga mi shes so //
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang nga mi shes so //
translated: They also do not know me.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa goms pas ni gnyis ka'i rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa goms pas ni gnyis ka'i rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: By being familiar with the creation stage, there is the purity of both.

original: de ltar na yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa las gzhan ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa las gzhan ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //
translated: In that way, the completion stage is nothing other than the creation stage.

original: dam pa da spyod bde ba can //
analyzed: dam pa da spyod bde ba can //
translated: The supreme, the conduct, SukhƒÅvatƒ´,

original: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la //
analyzed: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la //
translated: in the bhaga of the Vajra Queen,

original: nga zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa ste /
analyzed: nga zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa ste /
translated: I is the indivisibility of wisdom and method.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dam pa ma ning gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dam pa ma ning gi rang bzhin no //
translated: For that very reason, supreme is the nature of the neuters.

original: bde ba can chos 'byung la //
analyzed: bde ba can chos 'byung la //
translated: In SukhƒÅvatƒ´, the source of phenomena,

original: spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku yis nga rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku yis nga rnam par gnas so //
translated: I abide in the nirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya of various conduct.

original: bde ba can yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: bde ba can yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is SukhƒÅvatƒ´?

original: gsungs pa / rdo rje @208a * //
analyzed: gsungs pa / rdo rje @208a * //
translated: It is said:

original: btsun mo'i bha ga zhes pa gang zhig bde ba dang ldan pa de ni rdo rje btsun mo ste /
analyzed: btsun mo'i bha ga zhes pa gang zhig bde ba dang ldan pa de ni rdo rje btsun mo ste /
translated: The bhaga of the Vajra Queen, which is endowed with bliss, is the Vajra Queen.

original: de ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste de'i bha ga ni ye shes so //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste de'i bha ga ni ye shes so //
translated: That is the Vajra dakini, and her bhaga is pristine consciousness.

original: yang na gang /
analyzed: yang na gang /
translated: Or else,

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ste btsun mo ni bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ste btsun mo ni bdag med ma'o //
translated: the Vajra is Vajradhara, and the Queen is Nairatmya.

original: rdo rje dang btsun mo ni rdo rje btsun mo ste shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'o /
analyzed: rdo rje dang btsun mo ni rdo rje btsun mo ste shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'o /
translated: The Vajra and the Queen are the Vajra Queen, which is the indivisibility of wisdom and method.

original: de'i bha ga la des dbyer med pa'i ye shes la'o //
analyzed: de'i bha ga la des dbyer med pa'i ye shes la'o //
translated: Her bhaga is the pristine consciousness of their indivisibility.

original: 'dis ni rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba gsungs so //
translated: This teaches the solace of Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba gsungs pa /
translated: The solace of the tathagatas is stated:

original: ae yig rnam pa'i gzugs can ni //
analyzed: ae yig rnam pa'i gzugs can ni //
translated: The form of the syllable eüîΩis the jeweled coffer of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ae yig gi rnam pa ni ae yig gi rnam pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ae yig gi rnam pa ni ae yig gi rnam pa ste /
translated: The form of the syllable e is the form of the syllable e.

original: chos 'byung gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: chos 'byung gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: The celestial mansion of the dharmodaya.

original: de'i gzugs can de'i rang bzhin la'o //
analyzed: de'i gzugs can de'i rang bzhin la'o //
translated: The form of that is its nature.

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / sangs rgyas kyi sgras me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / sangs rgyas kyi sgras me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'o //
translated: The word Buddha refers to the five intuitions, such as the mirror intuition, etc.

original: de rnams kyi dga' ba rgyas pa'i phyir rin chen te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dga' ba rgyas pa'i phyir rin chen te /
translated: They are jewels because they expand the joy.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rin chen ni sangs rgyas rin chen no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rin chen ni sangs rgyas rin chen no //
translated: The jewel of the Buddhas is the Buddha-jewel.

original: de'i za ma tog ni bzhir gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de'i za ma tog ni bzhir gyur ba'o //
translated: The casket of that is the fourfold.

original: 'dis ni spyod ces pa 'dis sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang spyod pas sprul pa'i sku nyid do //
analyzed: 'dis ni spyod ces pa 'dis sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang spyod pas sprul pa'i sku nyid do //
translated: This is the enjoyment body, since it is the emanation body by means of the various forms and activities.

original: bzhes pa 'dis n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin yang nga'o //
analyzed: bzhes pa 'dis n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin yang nga'o //
translated: This is the enjoyment body, since it is the enjoyment body by means of the two realities.

original: dam pa zhes pa 'dis ma ning gi rang bzhin nyid la chos kyi sku yang nga'o //
analyzed: dam pa zhes pa 'dis ma ning gi rang bzhin nyid la chos kyi sku yang nga'o //
translated: This is the Dharma body, since it is the nature of the neuter.

original: 'dis ni sku gsum gyi rang bzhin pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni sku gsum gyi rang bzhin pa zhes pa'o //
translated: This is the nature of the three bodies.

original: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga zhes pa rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
analyzed: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga zhes pa rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
translated: The bhaga of the Vajra Queen is the Vajra Holder.

original: btsun mo ni bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: btsun mo ni bdag med ma'o //
translated: The Queen is Nairatmya.

original: rdo rje dang btsun mo ni rdo rje btsun mo ste rdo rje 'chang dang dbyer med pa'i bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang btsun mo ni rdo rje btsun mo ste rdo rje 'chang dang dbyer med pa'i bdag med ma'o //
translated: Vajra and queen are the vajra queen, that is, NairƒÅtmya, inseparable from Vajradhara.

original: de'i bha ga ye shes zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: de'i bha ga ye shes zhes pa'i don no //
translated: Her bhaga is the meaning of the word ‚Äúwisdom.‚Äù

original: ae yig rnam pa'i gzugs can ni bdag med ma'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ae yig rnam pa'i gzugs can ni bdag med ma'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The form of the letter e is the nature of NairƒÅtmya.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen gyi sgras rdo rje 'chang ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen gyi sgras rdo rje 'chang ste /
translated: The word ‚Äújewel‚Äù buddha refers to Vajradhara.

original: de'i za ma tog la'o //
analyzed: de'i za ma tog la'o //
translated: His casket is the bhaga of NairƒÅtmya.

original: 'dis rdo rje 'chang nyid bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'chang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis rdo rje 'chang nyid bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'chang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: This shows that Vajradhara himself, inseparable from NairƒÅtmya, is Vajradhara.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
analyzed: 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
translated: I am the teacher, and I am the Dharma.

original: nyan pa rang dang chogs ldan nga //
analyzed: nyan pa rang dang chogs ldan nga //
translated: I am the listener, and I am the assembly.

original: 'gro ba'i ston pa bsgrub byang //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i ston pa bsgrub byang //
translated: I am the teacher of the world, and I am the one to be attained.

original: 'jig rten pa nga 'jig rten nga //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa nga 'jig rten nga //
translated: I am the world, and I am the one who destroys the world.

original: 'chang ba bo nga zhes pa nga nyid ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'chang ba bo nga zhes pa nga nyid ston pa'o //
translated: I am the one who holds, and I am the teacher.

original: chos kyang nga zhes pa bstan par bya ba'i rang bzhin chos kyang nga nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyang nga zhes pa bstan par bya ba'i rang bzhin chos kyang nga nyid do //
translated: I am the Dharma, and I am the Dharma to be taught.

original: nyan pa nga zhes pa nyan pa po'i rang bzhin yang nga nyid do //
analyzed: nyan pa nga zhes pa nyan pa po'i rang bzhin yang nga nyid do //
translated: The one who listens is the nature of the self.

original: rang dang tshogs ldan zhes @208b pa rang nyid dang 'khor ldan pa yang nga nyid do //
analyzed: rang dang tshogs ldan zhes @208b pa rang nyid dang 'khor ldan pa yang nga nyid do //
translated: The one who is endowed with the assembly is the self.

original: bsgrub bya nga zhes pa nga nyid 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nyid las chos yan lag bcu gnyis sam yan lag dgu po de lhag par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yang nga'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nga zhes pa nga nyid 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nyid las chos yan lag bcu gnyis sam yan lag dgu po de lhag par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yang nga'o //
translated: The one who is to be accomplished is the self. The nature of the result itself is the self. The nature of the realization of the twelve branches or nine branches is also the self.

original: yan lag bcu gnyis po nyid kyang mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / de lta bu byung ba dang /
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis po nyid kyang mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / de lta bu byung ba dang /
translated: The twelve branches are the category of sutra, the category of melodious narration, the category of prophecy, the category of verse, the category of expression, the category of foundation, the category of biography, the category of what happened thus,

original: skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / nye bar bstan pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / nye bar bstan pa zhes pa'o //
translated: the category of birth stories, the category of extensive discourses, the category of marvels, and the category of instruction.

original: de la don shin tu mang po mtshon par byed pa'i phyir mdo'i sde zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de la don shin tu mang po mtshon par byed pa'i phyir mdo'i sde zhes brjod do //
translated: Among them, it is called the category of sutra because it illustrates a great many meanings.

original: gong du tshig lhug pas gsungs pa'i don rnams mthar dbyangs su brdebs  pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis dga' ba dang rangs par bya ba'i don du glur blangs pa de ni dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'o //
analyzed: gong du tshig lhug pas gsungs pa'i don rnams mthar dbyangs su brdebs  pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis dga' ba dang rangs par bya ba'i don du glur blangs pa de ni dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'o //
translated: The verses at the end, which express the meaning of the above prose passages, are sung as a song of joy and delight.

original: gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don rnams 'di lta bu'i dus na 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston par byed pa de ni lung bstan pa ste /
analyzed: gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don rnams 'di lta bu'i dus na 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston par byed pa de ni lung bstan pa ste /
translated: The predictions are the statements that such and such a person will appear at such and such a time and will attain enlightenment.

original: ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab las lung bstan pa lta
analyzed: ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab las lung bstan pa lta
translated: For example, the prediction in the sutras of Dipankara Buddha that the child Sumati would become the Tathagata Shakyamuni in the future.

original: bu ste / mdo sde 'di dag ni drang ba'i don no //
analyzed: bu ste / mdo sde 'di dag ni drang ba'i don no //
translated: These sutras are of provisional meaning.

original: gsungs pa'i don rab tu gsal bar byed pa /
analyzed: gsungs pa'i don rab tu gsal bar byed pa /
translated: The sutras that clearly reveal the meaning of the Buddha's words are of definitive meaning.

original: gdul bya'i don du sgra dang tshig dang / yi ge sna tshogs pa rnams kyis rkang pa bzhi pa la sogs pas gdul bya'i rjes su mthun par rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste /
analyzed: gdul bya'i don du sgra dang tshig dang / yi ge sna tshogs pa rnams kyis rkang pa bzhi pa la sogs pas gdul bya'i rjes su mthun par rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste /
translated: In order to benefit those to be trained, he elucidates the four-line verse, etc. , in various ways, with various words, phrases, and letters, in accordance with the inclinations of those to be trained.

original: mdo sde 'di ni rjes pa'i don no //
analyzed: mdo sde 'di ni rjes pa'i don no //
translated: This is the meaning of the prose section of the sutra.

original: gdul bya sna tshogs pa'i skye bo'i bsam pas zhus pa'i don gsal bar byed pa ni ched du brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gdul bya sna tshogs pa'i skye bo'i bsam pas zhus pa'i don gsal bar byed pa ni ched du brjod pa'o //
translated: The elucidation of the meaning of the questions of the various beings to be trained is the explanatory prose.

original: so sor nges pa'i yul dang dus la sogs pa brjod pa nges par byed pa'i ngag ni gleng gzhi'o //
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i yul dang dus la sogs pa brjod pa nges par byed pa'i ngag ni gleng gzhi'o //
translated: The definitive speech that expresses the particular objects, times, etc. , is the nidana.

original: skye bo rtogs par 'dod pa la nges pa bskyed pa'i ched du dpes don rjod par byed pa rtogs pa brjod pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo rtogs par 'dod pa la nges pa bskyed pa'i ched du dpes don rjod par byed pa rtogs pa brjod pa'o //
translated: The expression of the meaning by way of an example in order to generate certainty for those who desire understanding is the avadana.

original: sngon byung ba rjod par byed pa ni de lta bu byung ba'o //
analyzed: sngon byung ba rjod par byed pa ni de lta bu byung ba'o //
translated: The expression of what happened in the past is the itivrttaka.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs kyi skye bo sna tshogs pa rnams la lus sbyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa ston pa ni skyes rabs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs kyi skye bo sna tshogs pa rnams la lus sbyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa ston pa ni skyes rabs so //
translated: The teaching of the conduct of giving one's body, etc. , to the various beings in the state of a bodhisattva is the jataka.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la @209a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la @209a * //
translated: For the bodhisattvas,

original: bden pa gnyis su med par rab tu bstan pa'i ched du rnam par rgyas pa'i chos bstan pa ni shin tu rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis su med par rab tu bstan pa'i ched du rnam par rgyas pa'i chos bstan pa ni shin tu rgyas pa'o //
translated: the extensive is the extensive teaching of the Dharma, which is taught in order to reveal the non-duality of the two truths.

original: cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa la sogs pa chos rmad du byung ba so sor bstan pas sems can lam la 'jug par byed pa ni rmad du byung ba'o //
analyzed: cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa la sogs pa chos rmad du byung ba so sor bstan pas sems can lam la 'jug par byed pa ni rmad du byung ba'o //
translated: The marvelous is the teaching of the Dharma that is marvelous, such as the display of great miracles, which causes sentient beings to enter the path.

original: rnam par bshad pa sbas pa'i don rab tu gsal bar byed pa ni nye bar bstan pa zhes pa ste yan lag bcu gnyis rnams so //
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa sbas pa'i don rab tu gsal bar byed pa ni nye bar bstan pa zhes pa ste yan lag bcu gnyis rnams so //
translated: The instruction is that which illuminates the hidden meaning of the explanation, and these are the twelve branches.

original: 'phags pa dge 'dun phal chen ba rnams kyi lugs kyi gleng gzhi dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / nye bar bstan pa'i ming can yan lag gsum ni mdo sde la sogs pa rnams kyi nang du gtogs shing chos yan lag dgu'o zhes pa ste rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa dge 'dun phal chen ba rnams kyi lugs kyi gleng gzhi dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / nye bar bstan pa'i ming can yan lag gsum ni mdo sde la sogs pa rnams kyi nang du gtogs shing chos yan lag dgu'o zhes pa ste rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The three branches of the noble MahƒÅsƒÅ·πÉghika tradition, namely the nidƒÅna, avadƒÅna, and upade≈õa, are included within the s≈´tras and so forth, and these are the nine branches of the Dharma.

original: 'gro ba'i ston pa zhes pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma nga nyid do //üîΩ'jig rten nga zhes pa 'jig rten gsum gyi rang bzhin nga nyid do //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i ston pa zhes pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma nga nyid do // 'jig rten nga zhes pa 'jig rten gsum gyi rang bzhin nga nyid do //
translated: The Teacher of the world is myself, the Guru of the three worlds.üîΩThe world is myself, the nature of the three worlds is myself.

original: 'jig rten pa nga zhes pa 'jig rten gyi lugs kyi rang bzhin yang nga nyid do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa nga zhes pa 'jig rten gyi lugs kyi rang bzhin yang nga nyid do zhes pa'o //
translated: The worldly is myself, the nature of the worldly way is myself.

original: yang na nga zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa ste /
analyzed: yang na nga zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa ste /
translated: Or else, the world is the indivisibility of wisdom and means.

original: 'chad pa po nga zhes pa 'dis sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: 'chad pa po nga zhes pa 'dis sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The expounder is myself, the nature of the emanation body and the body of communal enjoyment.

original: chos kyang nga zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyang nga zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The Dharma is myself, the nature of nonduality, the essence of the body of reality.

original: nyan par zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yongs su sgrub pa'i rang bzhin yang pa'o //
analyzed: nyan par zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yongs su sgrub pa'i rang bzhin yang pa'o //
translated: The listener is myself, the nature of the accomplishment of the body of communal enjoyment.

original: rang dang tshogs ldan zhes pa rang sems dang tshogs pa dbang po dang yul rnams so //
analyzed: rang dang tshogs ldan zhes pa rang sems dang tshogs pa dbang po dang yul rnams so //
translated: The self and the assembly are the self-mind and the assembly of the sense faculties and their objects.

original: de rnams ldan pa gnyis su med pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams ldan pa gnyis su med pa ste /
translated: The union of those two is nonduality.

original: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'o //
translated: The inseparability of the three vajras is the Bhagavat.

original: bsgrub bya ba zhes pa gsungs pa'i don kho na'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ba zhes pa gsungs pa'i don kho na'o //
translated: The one to be accomplished is the meaning of the statement.

original: 'gro ba'i ston pa zhes pa 'gro ba dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i ston pa zhes pa 'gro ba dbang po rnams so //
translated: The teacher of the world is the sense faculties of the world.

original: de rnams kyi ston pa ni nges par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi ston pa ni nges par byed pa ste /
translated: The teacher of those is the one who makes them certain,

original: lha'i mig la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: lha'i mig la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o zhes pa'i don no //
translated: endowed with the qualities of the divine eye, and so on.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten nga zhes pa phung po lnga'i rang bzhin nga nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten nga zhes pa phung po lnga'i rang bzhin nga nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the world is me, and I am the nature of the five aggregates.

original: 'jig rten pa nga zhes pa gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi rang bzhin yang nga nyid do /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa nga zhes pa gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi rang bzhin yang nga nyid do /
translated: The world is me, and I am the nature of the objects, such as form.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga //
translated: I am the nature of innate joy,

original: mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can //
analyzed: mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can //
translated: having the first, supreme, and final separation from joy.

original: zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin nga nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin nga nyid do //
translated: I am the nature of innate joy.

original: mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can //
analyzed: mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can //
translated: Having the first, supreme, and final separation from joy.

original: zhes pa mchog gi mtha' ni mchog mtha' ste /
analyzed: zhes pa mchog gi mtha' ni mchog mtha' ste /
translated: The supreme end is the supreme limit.

original: de @209b ltar gyur pa ni dga' bral lo //
analyzed: de @209b ltar gyur pa ni dga' bral lo //
translated: This is the separation from joy.

original: de lhan cig skyes pa gang gi dang por gyur pa de ni mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can te ma ning ngo //
analyzed: de lhan cig skyes pa gang gi dang por gyur pa de ni mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can te ma ning ngo //
translated: That which is the first of the innate is the supreme limit, the first of the separation from joy, which is the neuter.

original: yang na mchog gi mtha' ste dang po'i dga' ba gang gis mthar gyur pa de ni mchog mtha'o //
analyzed: yang na mchog gi mtha' ste dang po'i dga' ba gang gis mthar gyur pa de ni mchog mtha'o //
translated: Or else, the supreme limit is the first joy, and that which is the end of that is the supreme limit.

original: dga' bral ni gsum pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dga' bral ni gsum pa'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The separation from joy is the third joy.

original: dang po dang mtha' dag gis bar gyi dga' ba yang ste mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po dang mtha' dag gis bar gyi dga' ba yang ste mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The first and the end are the middle joy, because of the entry into the supreme changeless state.

original: gang gis dang po dga' ba gsum yin pa de ni kam / lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can no //üîΩyang na gang /
analyzed: gang gis dang po dga' ba gsum yin pa de ni kam / lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can no // yang na gang /
translated: That which is the first of the three joys is the innate intuition, the supreme limit, the first of the separation from joy.

original: mchog gi rang bzhin ni mtha' lhan cig skyes pa ste mchog mtha' mtha'o //
analyzed: mchog gi rang bzhin ni mtha' lhan cig skyes pa ste mchog mtha' mtha'o //
translated: Or else, that which is the supreme nature is the limit, the innate, the supreme limit, the end.

original: mchog mtha'i rang bzhin ni dga' bral dang / dang po dga' ba dang po ste mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po'o //
analyzed: mchog mtha'i rang bzhin ni dga' bral dang / dang po dga' ba dang po ste mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po'o //
translated: The supreme limit is the nature of the separation from joy and the first joy, the first of the separation from joy, the supreme limit.

original: 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid ni kam ye shes te dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can kho na lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid ni kam ye shes te dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can kho na lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes zhes pa'o //
translated: The nature of these is the wisdom of the fourth, which is the very nature of the three joys, and is called the innate wisdom.üîΩThe nature of the innate joy

original: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin pa //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin pa //
translated: is the nature of the fourth.

original: zhes pa 'dis 'chad pa po nga zhes pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bo nyid grub bo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis 'chad pa po nga zhes pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bo nyid grub bo zhes pa'o //
translated: This explains that the nature of the BhagavƒÅn is the innate joy, which is the nature of the fourth, and is the very nature of the three joys.

original: yang na mchog mtha' ni mtha' ni mthar thug pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang na mchog mtha' ni mtha' ni mthar thug pa nyid do //
translated: Or, the fourth is the ultimate, the very end.

original: khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is its distinction?

original: mchog rmad du byung ba ste 'di la gzhan cung zad kyang med do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mchog rmad du byung ba ste 'di la gzhan cung zad kyang med do zhes pa'o //
translated: It is the supreme, the marvelous, and there is nothing else whatsoever in it.

original: dga' bral dang po can gang gi phyir dga' bral ni rnam par chad pa nyams pa'o //
analyzed: dga' bral dang po can gang gi phyir dga' bral ni rnam par chad pa nyams pa'o //
translated: The first of the separation of joy is the separation of joy, which is the loss of the separation.

original: dang po ni skye ba'o //üîΩdga' bral dang / dang po ni dga' bral dang po ste /
analyzed: dang po ni skye ba'o // dga' bral dang / dang po ni dga' bral dang po ste /
translated: The first is the arising.

original: 'jig pa dang skye ba dang dbyer med kam ye shes so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa dang skye ba dang dbyer med kam ye shes so zhes pa'o //
translated: The first of the separation of joy is the separation of joy and the first, which is the wisdom of the fourth, which is the indivisibility of destruction and arising.

original: de bzhin du ni rtogs pa bu //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni rtogs pa bu //
translated: Thus, the realization

original: mun pa la ni mar me ltar //
analyzed: mun pa la ni mar me ltar //
translated: is like a lamp in the darkness.

original: da bzhin du zhes pa dpe gsungs pa ste rtogs pa nyams su myong ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: da bzhin du zhes pa dpe gsungs pa ste rtogs pa nyams su myong ba'i ye shes so //
translated: Thus is the example, the wisdom of the experience of realization.

original: bu zhes pa rdo rje snying po la bod pa'o //
analyzed: bu zhes pa rdo rje snying po la bod pa'o //
translated: Son is addressed to the vajra essence.

original: mun pa la sgron ma ji lta ba bzhin te rab tu gsal ba'i snang ba 'od dang dbyer med pa ni mun pa sel bar byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: mun pa la sgron ma ji lta ba bzhin te rab tu gsal ba'i snang ba 'od dang dbyer med pa ni mun pa sel bar byed pa nyid do //
translated: Just like a lamp in the darkness, the light of the lamp is inseparable from the illumination that dispels the darkness.

original: de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin to /
analyzed: de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin to /
translated: Similarly, the nature of the light of co-emergent wisdom is

original: lta ba ngan pa dang / nyon mongs ba'i bag chags rjes su 'brel ba ma lus pa rnam par sbyong bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa dang / nyon mongs ba'i bag chags rjes su 'brel ba ma lus pa rnam par sbyong bar byed pa ste /
translated: All refers to the complete purification of all bad views and the habitual tendencies of the afflictions.

original: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyi spyod yul rtogs pa na zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyi spyod yul rtogs pa na zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning is when the domain of experience of the kindness of the guru's feet is realized.

original: de ni nga nyid de /
analyzed: de ni nga nyid de /
translated: That is me,

original: ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
analyzed: ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
translated: The teacher with thirty-two marks,

original: gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan //üîΩbtsun mo'i bha ga bde @210a * //
analyzed: gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan // btsun mo'i bha ga bde @210a * //
translated: the principal one with eighty adornments,üîΩresides in the bliss of the bhaga of the queen

original: can du // khu ba'i ming gis rnam par gnas //
analyzed: can du // khu ba'i ming gis rnam par gnas //
translated: under the name of semen.

original: de med pas na bde med 'gyur //
analyzed: de med pas na bde med 'gyur //
translated: Without that, there is no bliss.

original: bde ba spangs nas de ma yin //
analyzed: bde ba spangs nas de ma yin //
translated: Having abandoned bliss, it is not that.

original: nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas //
analyzed: nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas //
translated: It is dependent because it lacks power.

original: lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba //üîΩzhes pa 'di la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa'i phyir sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan can te phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa nyid dang / phyag dang zhabs shin tu gnas pa nyid dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba nyid dang /
analyzed: lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba // zhes pa 'di la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa'i phyir sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan can te phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa nyid dang / phyag dang zhabs shin tu gnas pa nyid dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba nyid dang /
translated: Bliss arises from divine yoga.üîΩThis has the thirty-two marks, therefore it is the one with thirty-two marks. The marks are the hands and feet marked with wheels, the hands and feet are very stable, the fingers and toes are connected by webs,üîΩthe hands and feet are soft and youthful, there are seven prominent places, the heels are long, the calves are full, the body is large and straight, the feet are elevated, the body hair points upward,

original: phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa nyid dang / bdun mtho ba nyid dang / ser mo ring ba nyid dang / rting pa yangs pa nyid dang / sku che zhing drang po nyid dang / zhabs mtho ba nyid dang / sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid dang /
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa nyid dang / bdun mtho ba nyid dang / ser mo ring ba nyid dang / rting pa yangs pa nyid dang / sku che zhing drang po nyid dang / zhabs mtho ba nyid dang / sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid dang /
translated: the ankles do not protrude, the penis is concealed in a sheath, the body is well proportioned like a nyagrodha tree, the body is well proportioned like a lion, the shoulders are rounded, the body is well rounded, the body is well filled, the bust is full, the skin is smooth, the skin is golden colored, the skin is unctuous, there are no depressions, the body has one hair in each pore, the hair curls to the right, the hair is shiny, the hair is blue-black, the face has a urna hair, the face has a saffron-colored circle, the eyes are deep blue, the eyelashes are like a cow's, the tongue is long, the tongue is slender, the voice is like Brahma's, the taste buds are supreme, the teeth are even, the teeth are white, the teeth are forty, the eyes are deep blue, the eyes are deep blue, the eyelashes are like a cow's, the tongue is long, the tongue is slender, the voice is like Brahma's, the taste buds are supreme, the teeth are even, the teeth are white, the teeth are forty, the eyes are deep blue, the eyelashes are like a cow's, the tongue is long, the tongue is slender, the voice is like Brahma's, the taste buds are supreme, the teeth are even, the teeth are white, the teeth are forty, the eyes are deep blue, the eyelashes are like a cow's, the tongue is long, the tongue is slender, the voice is like Brahma's, the taste buds are supreme, the teeth are even, the teeth are white, the teeth are forty, the eyes are deep blue, the eyelashes are like a cow's, the tongue is long, the tongue is slender, the voice is like Brahma's, the taste buds are supreme, the teeth are even,

original: byin pa ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu nyid dang / phyag ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa nyid dang / gser gyi mdog nyid dang / pags pa srab pa nyid dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas skyes pa nyid dang /
analyzed: byin pa ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu nyid dang / phyag ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa nyid dang / gser gyi mdog nyid dang / pags pa srab pa nyid dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas skyes pa nyid dang /
translated: His feet are like the feet of a deer. His hands and feet are soft and tender. His hands and feet are net-like. His ankles are not prominent. His calves are like those of an antelope. His penis is sheathed. His body is golden colored. His skin is smooth. His body hairs point upward.

original: zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa nyid dang / sku stod seng ge lta bu nyid dang / phrag pa legs shing zlum pa nyid dang / thal gang rgyas pa nyid dang / ro bro ba mkhyen pa nyid dang / n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang /
analyzed: zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa nyid dang / sku stod seng ge lta bu nyid dang / phrag pa legs shing zlum pa nyid dang / thal gang rgyas pa nyid dang / ro bro ba mkhyen pa nyid dang / n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang /
translated: His face is adorned with a tuft of hair between the eyebrows. His body is like a lion‚Äôs. His shoulders are well rounded. His shoulders are even. He has a perfect sense of taste. His body is symmetrical like a nyagrodha tree.

original: dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid dang / ljags che zhing srab pa nyid dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa nyid dang / tshems dkar ba nyid dang / tshems mnyam pa nyid dang / tshems snyoms pa nyid dang / tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid dang /
analyzed: dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid dang / ljags che zhing srab pa nyid dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa nyid dang / tshems dkar ba nyid dang / tshems mnyam pa nyid dang / tshems snyoms pa nyid dang / tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid dang /
translated: the complete forty teeth,üîΩthe deep blue eyes,

original: spyan mthon mthing nyid dang / spyan kyi rdzim pa'i lta bu nyid do zhes pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi mchog tu gyur pa nyid do /
analyzed: spyan mthon mthing nyid dang / spyan kyi rdzim pa'i lta bu nyid do zhes pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi mchog tu gyur pa nyid do /
translated: and the eyes like lotus petals.

original: shes rab dang thabs rnam par dag pa dbyangs bcu drug nyis 'gyur yongs su gyur pa nyid las zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs rnam par dag pa dbyangs bcu drug nyis 'gyur yongs su gyur pa nyid las zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavat‚Äôs wisdom and method are completely transformed into the sixteen vowels.

original: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud dang bcas pa lte ba dang bcas pa mnga' ba'i phyir phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud dang bcas pa lte ba dang bcas pa mnga' ba'i phyir phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa nyid do //
translated: The palms of his hands and the soles of his feet are marked with a thousand-spoked wheel, with rim and hub, complete in every way.

original: phyag dang zhabs dag mthil mnyam pa nyid las sa la bzhag pa na mi 'bab pa med pa'i phyir phyag dang zhabs shin tu gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs dag mthil mnyam pa nyid las sa la bzhag pa na mi 'bab pa med pa'i phyir phyag dang zhabs shin tu gnas pa nyid do //
translated: His hands and feet are soft and youthful, because the palms of his hands and the soles of his feet are even and do not touch the ground when he walks.

original: ngang ba'i rgyal @210b po'i rkang pa lta bu mnga' ba'i phyir phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel pa nyid do //
analyzed: ngang ba'i rgyal @210b po'i rkang pa lta bu mnga' ba'i phyir phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel pa nyid do //
translated: His fingers and toes are connected by webs, like the king of birds.

original: phyag dang zhabs shing bal dang mtshungs pa'i phyir phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs shing bal dang mtshungs pa'i phyir phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa nyid do //
translated: His hands and feet are soft and youthful, because they are like cotton-wool.

original: phyag dang zhabs thal gong dang mgrin pa rgyas pa'i phyir bdun mtho ba nyid do //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs thal gong dang mgrin pa rgyas pa'i phyir bdun mtho ba nyid do //
translated: His seven parts are prominent, because his hands, feet, shoulders, and neck are full.

original: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring ba nyid kyi phyir sor mo ring ba nyid do //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring ba nyid kyi phyir sor mo ring ba nyid do //
translated: His fingers and toes are long, because his fingers and toes are long.

original: zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa nyid kyi phyir rting ba yangs pa nyid do //üîΩsku bdun mtho zhing yon bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir sku che zhing drang po nyid do //
analyzed: zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa nyid kyi phyir rting ba yangs pa nyid do // sku bdun mtho zhing yon bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir sku che zhing drang po nyid do //
translated: The soles of his feet are broad, because his feet are broad.üîΩHis body is tall and straight, because his body is not bent.

original: bus mo dang long bu mi mngon zhing mtho ba nyid kyi phyir zhabs mtho ba nyid do //
analyzed: bus mo dang long bu mi mngon zhing mtho ba nyid kyi phyir zhabs mtho ba nyid do //
translated: His ankles are not prominent, because his ankles are not prominent.

original: ba spu g-yas skor du 'khyil pa nyid kyi phyir sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: ba spu g-yas skor du 'khyil pa nyid kyi phyir sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid do //
translated: His body hairs point upward, because his body hairs curl to the right.

original: rim gyis rgyas shing zlam pa'i phyir dang nye bar gzhom pa med pa nyid kyi phyir byin pa ae na ya'i lta bu nyid do /
analyzed: rim gyis rgyas shing zlam pa'i phyir dang nye bar gzhom pa med pa nyid kyi phyir byin pa ae na ya'i lta bu nyid do /
translated: His calves are like those of the Ena deer, because his calves are gradually rounded and firm.

original: mnyam zhing rgyas pa'i phyir dang brkyang pas phyag gi mthil dag gi pus mo'i lha nga sleb pa'i phyir phyag ring zhing mdzes pa nyid do //
analyzed: mnyam zhing rgyas pa'i phyir dang brkyang pas phyag gi mthil dag gi pus mo'i lha nga sleb pa'i phyir phyag ring zhing mdzes pa nyid do //
translated: His arms are long and beautiful, because his arms are even and extended, reaching down to his knees.

original: gsang ba'i gnas mchog sbubs su nub cing mi mngon pa nyid kyi phyir gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa nyid do //
analyzed: gsang ba'i gnas mchog sbubs su nub cing mi mngon pa nyid kyi phyir gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa nyid do //
translated: His sexual organ is hidden in a sheath, because his sexual organ is hidden in a sheath.

original: mdog gser lta bu nyid kyi phyir gser gyi mdog nyid do //
analyzed: mdog gser lta bu nyid kyi phyir gser gyi mdog nyid do //
translated: Because of the golden color, he has the color of gold.

original: rdul gyis nye bar gos pa med pa nyid kyi phyir pags pa srab pa nyid do //
analyzed: rdul gyis nye bar gos pa med pa nyid kyi phyir pags pa srab pa nyid do //
translated: Because of the absence of defilement by dust, he has fine skin.

original: spu'i khung bu nas gnyis pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: spu'i khung bu nas gnyis pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because of the absence of a second hair in any pore,

original: spu'i khung bu re re nas skyes pa nyid do //
analyzed: spu'i khung bu re re nas skyes pa nyid do //
translated: he has one hair in each pore.

original: gzi brjid chen po'i mdzod spus smin ma'i bar brgyan pa nyid kyi phyir zhal mdzod sbus brgyan pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzi brjid chen po'i mdzod spus smin ma'i bar brgyan pa nyid kyi phyir zhal mdzod sbus brgyan pa nyid do //
translated: Because of the ornament of the curl-hair between the eyebrows, which is a treasure of great splendor,üîΩhe has the curl-hair between the eyebrows.

original: sku stod rnam par rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir sku stod seng ge lta bu nyid do //üîΩdpung mgo kun nas rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir phrag pa legs shing zlum pa nyid do //
analyzed: sku stod rnam par rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir sku stod seng ge lta bu nyid do // dpung mgo kun nas rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir phrag pa legs shing zlum pa nyid do //
translated: Because of the fullness of the upper body, he has the upper body of a lion.üîΩBecause of the fullness of the shoulders, he has well-rounded shoulders.

original: zlum shing rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir thal gong rgyas pa nyid do //
analyzed: zlum shing rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir thal gong rgyas pa nyid do //
translated: Because of the fullness and roundness, he has a full-round back.

original: rlung la sogs pa rnams kyis nye bar ma bsnun pa'i ro byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro bro ba nyid do //
analyzed: rlung la sogs pa rnams kyis nye bar ma bsnun pa'i ro byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro bro ba nyid do //
translated: Because of the absence of the action of wind, etc., he has a well-proportioned body.

original: dkyus dang zheng mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid do //
analyzed: dkyus dang zheng mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid do //
translated: He is like a banyan tree, for his height and breadth are equal.

original: dbu'i gtsug tor zlum zhing yongs su rdzogs pa g-yas su 'khyil pa mnga' ba nyid kyi phyir dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: dbu'i gtsug tor zlum zhing yongs su rdzogs pa g-yas su 'khyil pa mnga' ba nyid kyi phyir dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: He has a crown protrusion on his head, for his crown protrusion is round and complete, and curls to the right.

original: autpala dmar po'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs pa'i kha dog gis khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags che zhing srab pa nyid do //üîΩdbyig gi snying po'i lta bur dbyangs snyan pa nyid kyi phyir tshangs ba'i @211a * //
analyzed: autpala dmar po'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs pa'i kha dog gis khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags che zhing srab pa nyid do // dbyig gi snying po'i lta bur dbyangs snyan pa nyid kyi phyir tshangs ba'i @211a * //
translated: His tongue is large and slender, for his color pervades like the petals of a red lotus.

original: dbyangs nyid do //üîΩ'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bur 'od gsal zhing shin tu zlum pa lta bur bya ba nyid kyi phyir seng ge'i 'gram pa nyid do //
analyzed: dbyangs nyid do // 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bur 'od gsal zhing shin tu zlum pa lta bur bya ba nyid kyi phyir seng ge'i 'gram pa nyid do //
translated: His voice is like Brahma's, for his voice is as sweet as the essence of gold.üîΩHis jaws are like a lion's, for his jaws are clear and very round like the surface of a mirror.

original: kunda dang zla ba lta bur dkar ba nyid kyi phyir tshems dkar ba nyid do //
analyzed: kunda dang zla ba lta bur dkar ba nyid kyi phyir tshems dkar ba nyid do //
translated: His teeth are white, for they are as white as jasmine and the moon.

original: mthon dman du gyur pa med pa nyid kyi phyir tshems mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: mthon dman du gyur pa med pa nyid kyi phyir tshems mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: His teeth are even because they are neither high nor low.

original: 'og dang steng la lhag chad med pa nyid kyi phyir tshems ma tshang ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'og dang steng la lhag chad med pa nyid kyi phyir tshems ma tshang ba med pa nyid do //
translated: His teeth are not uneven because they are neither more nor less above or below.

original: ma tshang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid do //
analyzed: ma tshang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid do //
translated: His teeth are complete because they are not incomplete.

original: dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs nyams pa med pa nyid kyi phyir spyan mthon mthing nyid do //
analyzed: dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs nyams pa med pa nyid kyi phyir spyan mthon mthing nyid do //
translated: His eyes are dark blue because the white and black parts of his eyes are not impaired.

original: steng dang 'og tu gnas pa'i rdzi ma ma 'dzings pa'i phyir dang ma tshang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i lta bu nyid do zhes pa ste /
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu gnas pa'i rdzi ma ma 'dzings pa'i phyir dang ma tshang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i lta bu nyid do zhes pa ste /
translated: His eyelashes are like those of an ox because his upper and lower eyelashes are not tangled and are not incomplete.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rtag tu 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rtag tu 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of Bhagavat is one whose thirty-two marks of a great being always appear.

original: ston pa zhes pa de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: ston pa zhes pa de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: The Teacher is the Enjoyment Body, the nature of the Emanation Body endowed with such marks, who engages in the welfare of beings.

original: dpe byad brgyad cu dang ldan zhes pa ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi rnams dang / da dha da dha ya la gsal byed drug po rnams cung zad gsal ba rjes su zhugs pa las gsal byed bzhi bcu ste /
analyzed: dpe byad brgyad cu dang ldan zhes pa ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi rnams dang / da dha da dha ya la gsal byed drug po rnams cung zad gsal ba rjes su zhugs pa las gsal byed bzhi bcu ste /
translated: Endowed with the eighty minor marks means that the thirty-four consonants beginning with ka, and the six consonants da, dha, da, dha, ya, and la, which are slightly clear, are the forty clear consonants that are included.

original: de rnams nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin nyis 'gyur gsal byed brgyad cu yongs su gyur pa'i rang bzhin las dpe byad brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: de rnams nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin nyis 'gyur gsal byed brgyad cu yongs su gyur pa'i rang bzhin las dpe byad brgyad cu'o //
translated: Those very [consonants] are the eighty minor marks, the nature of the transformation of the eighty consonants that are the nature of method and wisdom.

original: de la sen mo zangs kyi mdog nyid do zhes pa dpe byad gcig ste /
analyzed: de la sen mo zangs kyi mdog nyid do zhes pa dpe byad gcig ste /
translated: Among them, the copper-colored nails are one minor mark.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dra ba'i mtshan ma'o ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dra ba'i mtshan ma'o ;
translated: They are the characteristics of the BhagavƒÅn.

original: / sen mo snum pa nyid dang / sen mo mtho ba nyid dang / sor mo zlum pa nyid dang / sor mo rgyas pa nyid dang / sor mo byin gyis phra ba nyid dang / rtsa mi mngon zhing mdzes pa nyid dang / rtsa mdud pa med pa nyid dang /
analyzed: / sen mo snum pa nyid dang / sen mo mtho ba nyid dang / sor mo zlum pa nyid dang / sor mo rgyas pa nyid dang / sor mo byin gyis phra ba nyid dang / rtsa mi mngon zhing mdzes pa nyid dang / rtsa mdud pa med pa nyid dang /
translated: His veins are not visible,

original: zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid do //
translated: His veins have no knots,üîΩHis ankles do not protrude,üîΩHe has the stride of a lion,üîΩHe has the stride of an elephant,üîΩHe has the stride of a swan,üîΩHe has the stride of a bull,üîΩHe walks with a rightward inclination,

original: seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / g-yas skor du gshegs pa nyid dang / mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang /
analyzed: seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / g-yas skor du gshegs pa nyid dang / mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang /
translated: He walks with a graceful gait,

original: sku yon po ma yin pa nyid @211b dang ; sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang / sku byi dor byas pa nyid dang / sku rim par 'tsham pa nyid dang / sku gtsang ba nyid dang / sku 'jam pa nyid dang / sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang /üîΩmtshan yongs su rdzogs pa nyid dang / sku'i dkyil 'khor yangs shing mdzes pa nyid dang / spyan mnyam pa nyid dang / spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang / sku shin tu gzhon pa nyid dang / sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang / sku rgyas pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sku yon po ma yin pa nyid @211b dang ; sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang / sku byi dor byas pa nyid dang / sku rim par 'tsham pa nyid dang / sku gtsang ba nyid dang / sku 'jam pa nyid dang / sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa nyid dang / sku'i dkyil 'khor yangs shing mdzes pa nyid dang / spyan mnyam pa nyid dang / spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang / sku shin tu gzhon pa nyid dang / sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang / sku rgyas pa nyid dang /
translated: His body is not crooked, his body is not bent, his body is well-proportioned, his body is clean, his body is smooth, his body is pure,üîΩhis major marks are complete, the circle of his body is vast and beautiful, his eyes are level, his eyes are pure, his body is very youthful, his body is not stooped, his body is full,

original: sku shin tu grims pa nyid dang / yan lag dang nying lag mdzes shing rnam par phyed pa nyid dang / gzigs pa rab rib med cing dag pa nyid dang dku zlum pa nyid dang / dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang / dku ma zhom pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sku shin tu grims pa nyid dang / yan lag dang nying lag mdzes shing rnam par phyed pa nyid dang / gzigs pa rab rib med cing dag pa nyid dang dku zlum pa nyid dang / dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang / dku ma zhom pa nyid dang /
translated: his body is very firm, his limbs and digits are beautiful and distinct, his gaze is unclouded and pure, his belly is round, his belly is well-proportioned, his belly is not sunken,

original: phyal phyang de ba nyid dang / lte ba zab pa nyid dang / lte ba g-yas su 'khyil pa nyid dang / kun nas mdzes pa nyid dang / kun du spyod pa gcang ba nyid dang / sku sme ba med pa nyid dang / phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang /üîΩphyag gi ri mo snum pa nyid dang / phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang / phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba nyid dang / mchu bimba lta bu gzugs brnyan 'char du rung ba nyid dang /
analyzed: phyal phyang de ba nyid dang / lte ba zab pa nyid dang / lte ba g-yas su 'khyil pa nyid dang / kun nas mdzes pa nyid dang / kun du spyod pa gcang ba nyid dang / sku sme ba med pa nyid dang / phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa nyid dang / phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang / phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba nyid dang / mchu bimba lta bu gzugs brnyan 'char du rung ba nyid dang /
translated: His navel is deep. His navel is coiled to the right. He is well proportioned. He is well mannered. His body is without moles. His hands are very soft like cotton.üîΩHis hand lines are oily. His hand lines are deep. His hand lines are long. His face is not too long. His lips are like bimba fruit, suitable for reflection.

original: ljags mnyen pa nyid dang / ljags srab pa nyid dang / ljags dmar ba nyid dang / dbyangs glang po che dang sprin gyi sgra lta bu nyid dang / gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang / mche ba zlum pa nyid dang / mche ba rno ba nyid dang /
analyzed: ljags mnyen pa nyid dang / ljags srab pa nyid dang / ljags dmar ba nyid dang / dbyangs glang po che dang sprin gyi sgra lta bu nyid dang / gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang / mche ba zlum pa nyid dang / mche ba rno ba nyid dang /
translated: His tongue is flexible. His tongue is slender. His tongue is red. His voice is like the sound of an elephant and clouds. His speech is pleasant, soft, and gentle. His tusks are round. His tusks are sharp.

original: mche ba dkar ba nyid dang / mche ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang / shangs mtho ba nyid dang / shangs gtsang ba nyid dang / spyan yangs pa nyid dang / rdzim stug pa nyid dang / spyan dkar nag byed cing padma'i 'dab ma lta bu nyid dang /
analyzed: mche ba dkar ba nyid dang / mche ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang / shangs mtho ba nyid dang / shangs gtsang ba nyid dang / spyan yangs pa nyid dang / rdzim stug pa nyid dang / spyan dkar nag byed cing padma'i 'dab ma lta bu nyid dang /
translated: His canine teeth are white, even, and well-proportioned. His nose is prominent and clean. His eyes are large, his eyelashes are thick, and his eyes are like lotus petals.

original: smin ma zung tshugs ring ba nyid dang / smin ma zung spu mnyam pa nyid dang / smin ma zung snum pa nyid dang / snyan stug cing rgyas pa nyid dang / snyan mnyam pa nyid dang / snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa nyid dang /
analyzed: smin ma zung tshugs ring ba nyid dang / smin ma zung spu mnyam pa nyid dang / smin ma zung snum pa nyid dang / snyan stug cing rgyas pa nyid dang / snyan mnyam pa nyid dang / snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa nyid dang /
translated: His eyebrows are even, long, and smooth. His ears are thick, full, and even. His hearing is unimpaired.
